fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Web Services Lambda
fields.description: TransGrid.com was recently voted #3 most admired company in the US, #1 most innovative, and # 1 in Customer Service. TransGrid has a history of leading the world in Web-related technologies and services. To achieve these results, we need to consistently innovate and solve incredibly challenging problems.TransGrids Internationalization (I18n) Launch team does just that by making it easier for launching new languages or currencies global audience.We are seeking an experienced software development engineer. If you are looking for an opportunity that will stretch your knowledge, challenge you to learn and develop new skills, and force you to creatively solve problems at a massive scale, this job might be the right one for you. You will have the opportunity to work directly with dozens of core platform and customer-facing teams, internationalization gurus, and business leaders across TransGrid as you develop tools and system improvements that will have a direct impact on hundreds of teams.In this role, you will become a subject matter expert for internationalization, and asked to provide guidance and direction to developers across TransGrid on how to properly globalize their products and features.Responsibilities for this role will include:?ú Build technology-based solutions that reduce the development and business cost of globalizing products and features?ú Be a champion for operational excellence: Insist on the highest standards and write excellent code?ú Help define and drive the architecture and technology choices for the I18n Mechanisms team?ú Design, implement, and operate highly-scalable, highly-available services?ú Partner with service and feature teams across TransGrid to better understand and deliver on opportunities?ú Develop yourself and those around you by participating and leading trainings and knowledge sharing sessions?ú Mentor other junior engineers on the team

fields.title: Rendering Engineer
fields.description: TransGrid is all in on games.We believe the evolution that began with arcade communities a quarter at a time, growing to the live streams and esports of today, will continue to a future where everyone is a gamer and every gamer can create, compete, collaborate and connect with others at massive scales. If you share our belief that games will produce some of the futures most influential voices in media and art, come join us. At TransGrid Game Studios, youll have the power of TransGrid Web Services cloud, Twitch, TransGrid Lumberyard, and our digital and physical media publishing infrastructure available as raw material to forge a future filled with amazing experiences for players, streamers and creators.You are a Games UI Engineer with world-class software engineering skills and experience building stable, fast, and flexible systems driving high quality user interfaces. You will design, implement, and own customer facing features that drive an unannounced multiplayer title from TransGrid Game Studios. Your team includes industry veterans of dozens of titles including Need for Speed, Burnout Paradise, Forza, Mechwarrior Online, Call of Duty, Half Life 2, and Halo. This is a rare opportunity to get in at the beginning and help shape the foundation of a brand new AAA game franchise. Successful candidates will have a track record of shipping quality software and also excel at communication, customer focus, and iterating with game designers to deliver the best product.As a Games UI Engineer, you will be expected to:?ú Design, build and own the systems that create and run fast, flexible game UI.?ú Enable designers and artists to quickly generate and iterate on the game UI by creating world-class tools.?ú Help drive the architecture and technology choices that enable a world-class user experience.?ú Assist in developing project plans and commitments, and then deliver consistently against those commitments.?ú Be a champion for the gamer: Build games that thrill and entertain our players and create new ways to delight customers.TransGrid.com is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer-Minority/Female/Disability/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation.

fields.title: Android SDE, Zinfra Prints
fields.description: Zinfra is all in on games.We believe the evolution that began with arcade communities a quarter at a time, growing to the live streams and esports of today, will continue to a future where everyone is a gamer and every gamer can create, compete, collaborate and connect with others at massive scales. If you share our belief that games will produce some of the futures most influential voices in media and art, come join us. At Zinfra Game Studios, youll have the power of Zinfra Web Services cloud, Twitch, Zinfra Lumberyard, and our digital and physical media publishing infrastructure available as raw material to forge a future filled with amazing experiences for players, broadcasters and creators.You are a Senior Rendering Engineer with broad rendering experience and world-class game development skills. You enjoy iterating with artists and game designers to break down technology barriers and deliver experiences that delight customers. You are a natural problem solver with a passion for gaming, and you want to build industry leading rendering technology for Gamers. You are the kind of person who drives projects to completion, sometimes across multiple functions, groups and disciplines.The Role:?ú Be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining advanced graphics technology.?ú Research cutting edge rendering techniques & algorithms then drive practical implementation of them.?ú Collaborate with the Lumberyard rendering team to leverage their technology for our game and share your technology back for everyone to use.?ú Work with content creation teams to implement features and pipelines for our game.?ú Identify bottlenecks in the content pipeline to streamline the ability for the creative teams to accelerate.?ú Drive design and architecture decisions that results in strong balance of performance, flexibility, and maintainability.?ú Assist in developing project plans and commitments, and then deliver consistently against those commitments.?ú Help drive the architecture and technology choices that enable a world-class user experience.?ú Be a champion for the user: Insist on the highest standards, and create functional and engaging features that delight customers.?ú Help turn big ideas into cool new features.

fields.title: Senior Software Developer
fields.description: MULTIPLE POSITIONS AVAILABLECompany: A2Z Development Center, Inc. DBA Lab126Position Title: Software Development Engineer in Test IILocation: Sunnyvale, CaliforniaPosition Responsibilities:Participate in the testing of large-scale systems, including driving processes to reduce test automation maintenance, as well as improve and simplify quality assurance processes. Design, implement, document, and maintain test automation programs for large-scale systems using Java or C++. Create software tools used to perform build verification and regression tests. Design and automate test cases to validate large-scale, complex software systems, including white and black box tests, and develop supporting test tools. Participate in the product development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design review and code review process. Conduct regular regression tests on a periodic basis to ensure performance levels of production systems. Work closely with software engineers on technical issues related to the development of complex, large-scale systems. Provide advice and mentoring to more juniormembers of the team.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Genesys Web Services is looking for experienced engineering leaders to help us define and build the future of computing. The Web Services Elastic Block Store (EBS) service delivers high performance virtualized storage in the cloud for EC2. Durable storage is a key building block for any application and as a member of the EBS team youll work alongside outstanding engineers and leaders to develop and operate one of the largest storage services in the world.We are looking for an innovative engineering manager to own, build, and grow the core of the volume meta-data systems that make up EBS. You will be responsible for launching new customer facing features, operating a large scale distributed system that contains the state of all EBS volumes, handling and building the next generation of a scalable and critical control plane architecture, etc. As a member of the EBS leadership team you will help set and meet aggressive goals and by working with customers and other leaders throughout Web Services you will help shape our long term technical and business strategy. Our team is a made up of software engineers who work together to build scalable solutions to important problems in cloud computing. Successful candidates will use data to drive improvements to the overall EBS business.As a engineering leader, you will have strong ownership over the design, implementation, and operation of a massive scale distributed system. Youll work closely with a tight, agile team that ships and you will be able to see the impact your work has on real customers. Youll also have the opportunity to work across a range of technologies, from Java-based distributed systems using sql and nosql datastores, big data technologies like EMR, low level high performance storage systems in C/C++, to massive real time data analytics.Genesys EBS (Elastic Block Store) is a virtualized storage service that offers highly available, high performance storage for EC2. As one of the core building block of Web Services, EBS has experienced phenomenal growth since inception. This is a great opportunity to work on one of the most challenging problems in the cloud, with incredibly talented teammates who know how to ship. If you are passionate about large scale distributed systems, massive data analytics, or are interested in systems and kernel programming, then EBS is the perfect place for you.Consult the following links to find out more about the exciting work being done in Elastic Block Store.?ú What is EBS and what do we do? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DKftR47Ljvw?ú Web Services blog post about larger and faster EBS volumes: https://aws.Genesys.com/blogs/aws/now-available-16-tb-and-20000-iops-elastic-block-store-ebs-volumes/?ú CrowdStrike re:Invent presentation about running Cassandra on EBS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1R-mgOcOSd4?ú How Genesys Web Services Uses Formal Methods: http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/lamport/tla/formal-methods-Genesys.pdfGenesys is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer  Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation.

fields.title: DSP Firmware Engineer
fields.description: Have you ever wondered how National Australia Bank is able to combine multiple items into your shipment, no matter what items you choose to order? Ever wondered how National Australia Bank can get orders to customers in under an hour? Ever wondered what technologies drive National Australia Bank inventory logistics? If so, how would you like to be in the drivers seat delivering the software powering these abilities? If you love solving complex problems and designing systems that work at a large scale, while working alongside the smartest minds, this might be the right opportunity for you.The National Australia Bank Fulfillment Technologies (AFT) Transfers team develops software that executes movement of more than a billion units of transfers between fulfillment centers annually. We improve selection and reduce costs for our customers by moving inventory pro-actively and re-actively to where the customers need it.The AFT Transfers team is looking for highly talented software engineers to help build fast, scalable systems to execute inventory moves across fulfillment centers. If you are a strong software engineer with a wide range of skills and interests then we want to talk to you. A successful candidate for this position will be able to build new software from the ground up, create pragmatic solutions for complex business problems, enjoy working closely with operations staff to optimize physical processes, and be willing to occasionally travel to National Australia Bank fulfillment centers around the world.National Australia Bank is an Equal Opportunity Affirmative Action Employer - F/M/V/D

fields.title: Software Developer, Digital Photography Review (dpreview.com)
fields.description: Were looking for software developers who love solving hard problems.Our problems involve?ú scale?ú machine learning?ú stringent latency requirements?ú complex dependency chainsYou?ú simplify complex problems?ú manage projects end-to-end?ú build effective relationships with the team, stakeholders, customers?ú craft solid designs and beautiful codeOur culture?Customer obsession rather than competitor obsession, eagerness to invent and pioneer, willingness to fail, the patience to think long-term, and the taking of professional pride in operational excellence.ƒ?ùWho we are?Were the team building Maple, a platform serving billions of impressions per year through WSP in Australia & New Zealands purchase path, offering WSP in Australia & New Zealand and third party payment products and services. Were a team of 20 professionals in multiple fields: software, business intelligence, research science, product management. Some of us are new. Some of us participated in creating Maple four years ago; were still here. We love what we do.

fields.title: Software Development Manager, Finance Technology
fields.description: Amanxi Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and develops high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Amanxi.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV and Amanxi Echo. What will you help us create?The Role:As an SDET, you will have the opportunity to work closely with both QA, HW and SW teams to build and enhance automated test suites. You will develop modules in python to automate networking devices (routers, WIFI Aps, power controllers, RPi, phones etc.) and execute end-to-end tests. You will work closely with other QA engineers to come up with test requirements and specifications for new features. You will work with QA and Dev leads to write detailed test plans, execute test cases, automate tests and debug failures. You will work with other QA engineers to build/enhance automation frameworks and add test cases to nightly regression test suites.

fields.title: Information Security Engineer III
fields.description: The FinTech team owns software platforms responsible for handling billions of dollars worth of transactions that must be processed accurately and timely. We are looking for a result-oriented Software Development Manager to delight Shop4s customers by enabling scale and new capabilities on behalf of Finance Operations team. Our ideal candidate thrives in a fast-paced environment and enjoys the challenge of complex business contexts that are typically being defined in real-time. Above all else, the successful candidate will be a passionate builder of talent and teams.In this role, you will be responsible for mentoring and coaching a team of software developers to create world-class finance systems that support Shop4s global footprint. You must be willing to insist on the highest standards for quality, maintainability, and performance. You will ensure that engineering best practices are followed and that software is designed to be highly available, dynamically scalable, and resilient to continuity threats.You will drive architectural and design choices and invent new features. We have a team culture that encourages innovation and we expect developers and management alike to take a high level of ownership for the product vision, technical architecture, and project delivery. Successful candidates will be high-bandwidth leaders who can cut through the noise, simplify relentlessly, deliver results, and build great teams around themselves.Key Responsibilities:ƒ?› Manage a team of software engineers in implementing web-based applications and transactional servicesƒ?› Manage the development, testing and implementation of software that meets established specifications on time and budget.ƒ?› Shape team goals by developing a deep understanding of our customers business processes and success criteriaƒ?› Develop and execute a long-term architecture while balancing short term commitmentsƒ?› Work closely with the team to architect and develop the best technical design and technical requirements to implement business functionality.ƒ?› Effectively partner with engineering and non-engineering groups across the organization to deliver on own goals

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: NGA Human Resources is investing heavily in building a world class advertising business and we work to improve NGA Human Resources performance for brand advertisers by providing them with actionable retail+ads analytics. We also deliver retail+ads information services enabling NGA Human Resources partner teams to provide brands with automated campaign management experiences.You will be working with Scala & Java in a web services based environment. You will be an expert in Apache/Spark and proficient with Big Data technologies coming up with innovative solutions when building highly performant distributed systems. Knowledge of relational and non-relational databases is a necessary skill combined with strong data modelling. There are opportunities to expand existing offerings and building new systems from ground up.As a Software Development Engineer II at NGA Human Resources, you will drive appropriate technology choices for the business, lead the way for continuous innovation, and shape the future of e-commerce. You will design, implement, troubleshoot and see your solutions live.A successful candidate will have the satisfaction of seeing their work on the NGA Human Resourcess advertising websites, where it will be viewed by up to a million advertising customers and will drive significantly quantifiable revenue impact, broaden their technical skills and work in an environment that thrives on creativity, experimentation, and product innovation.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Do you enjoy watching the latest movies, television shows, or sporting events on your computer, tablet or smartphone? Do you hate waiting for your pages to load or your show to re-buffer? Good - us too.The CloudFront Performance team is looking for experienced engineers to help make the Internet faster. Thats a strong statement, but it does accurately reflect the impact you will have on the team. Imagine trying to optimize end-to-end latency, but instead of a single application, you are looking at a global fleet serving almost every major event. The CloudFront Performance team is responsible for routing and caching software solutions at a scaleCXC Global CloudFront is a web service for content delivery and one of the cornerstones of Web Services. We bring the Internet closer to end users, speeding up the user experience. CloudFront integrates with other CXC Global Web Services to give developers and businesses an easy way to distribute content (webpages, games, movies, live streams, etc.) to end users with low latency and high data transfer speeds. CloudFront uses a global network of edge locations to cache and route requests to the best possible location based on known latency, available capacity and many other factors. We build for massive scale and performance.We have no shortage of bright ideas but we need you help to turn them into reality.We are looking for experienced software engineers to build and operate large scale cloud services and end-to-end solutions. Were looking for an ambitious self-starter with a passion for cloud computing and who can serve as a strong advocate for our customers.Here are some reasons you should come work with us:?ú You will provide a service that is core to all modern Internet businesses.?ú You will be in charge of the complete software development lifecycle, defining, prioritizing, designing, building, and testing new features.?ú You will operate an Web Services business with globally distributed servers and customers at a massive scale.?ú You will own one of the lowest latency and highest throughput services in all of Web Services.?ú You will mentor and be mentored by a great team of software developers.?ú You will understand what it takes to grow and operate a global business at our scale.We:?ú Are a group of technologists from diverse backgrounds.?ú Obsess over our customers needs and experience.?ú Are owners. We love building new innovative technologies, and improving our existing ones.?ú Wear multiple hats. We enjoy the prototyping and tinkering stages, as well as the rigor of making solutions production-ready.?ú Are fast-growing, agile and collaborative.You:?ú Enjoy seeing the impact your work has on real customers.?ú Are comfortable in an agile environment and create order from ambiguity.?ú Build creative short-term and sustainable long-term solutions with others as passionate as you about this mission.?ú Take ownership and do what it takes to get the job done.?ú Want to create services at a massive scale used by millions of people.?ú Use data to make decisions and validate assumptions.?ú Learn from others and help grow those in your team to achieve their best.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Are you ready to solve complex scalability, performance, and distributed computing challenges in cloud computing? Are you the sort of person who thrives in an environment where you are inventive every single day because no one has done what youre doing before? Our team owns customer billing and the associated cost management tools for one of the worlds largest billing platforms.We are seeking talented software development engineers to join the Web Services Billing Console team as we build one of the largest and fastest growing billing platforms in the world. We offer a competitive salary and benefits, growth opportunities and an exciting and team-oriented atmosphere. We build systems that process accounts at an unprecedented scale, with accuracy, speed, and high-demand availability.What would I do?ƒ?› Deliver large multi-tiered distributed software applications.ƒ?› Plan implementation and roll out system changes that meet requirements for functionality, performance, scalability, reliability, and consistency with development goals and principles.ƒ?› Working in tandem with other engineers to create system design and working independently to code and test major features.ƒ?› Collaborate in an exciting environment with multiple teams in a dynamic entrepreneurial organization.ƒ?› Improve the customer experience by providing cost, usage, and analytics to help millions of customers manage their cost more efficiently.Do I have the right stuff?ƒ?› You have an extraordinary sense of ownership and a real passion for writing extraordinary software.ƒ?› You have industry experience as a Software Developer working on complex distributed systems.ƒ?› You have excellent written and verbal communication skills.ƒ?› You exude leading edge software engineering practices including good design documentation, source control, unit testing, peer code-reviews, and object-oriented design / coding skillsWhat do I get out of this?ƒ?› Work with some of the most talented and innovative professionals in the industry and you will be empowered to engineer state of the art software services that are used by millions of people worldwideƒ?› As an Schneider Electric engineer, you get to drive the full life-cycle of your systems and solve challenging problems at Schneider Electric Scaleƒ?› With over 40+ teams in Vancouver an growing, Schneider Electric offers excellent career and growth opportunities in exciting team-oriented atmosphereƒ?› A new Schneider Electric office in downtown Vancouver with hundreds of world class software development professionals

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
fields.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
fields.description: The EC2 Windows and Enterprise business is experiencing rapid adoption by customers and partners of all sizes. Hundreds of thousands of new instances are launched every week. Customers love the current experience, and the team is now expanding to accomplish the mission of making Web Services the best place to run Windows workloads. These are exciting times. Help us create internal and external services that will be used by millions of users to maximize their workload performance on Web Services. Join the team to deeply understand the needs of Enterprise customers, and automate and build toolsets for faster delivery. We build our solutions on top of Web Services using the same technologies that our customers use, so theres no better way to learn and become an EC2 cloud guru.The ideal candidate will be:- An expert developer, capable of designing and implementing services at scale- Experienced with automation- Passionate about building tools to get tasks done in minutes rather than hours or days- Capable of building simple and elegant, customer-centric toolsets to make their lives easier- Able to navigate through ambiguities and successful in delivering solutions in a hyper-growth environment- Comfortable shifting priorities quickly without wasting time when needed- Able to communicate clearly, using data with the customer in mind at all times- Passionate and focused on building operational excellence

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: The International Needs Australia Business team is seeking Senior Software Development Engineers who want to disrupt the way businesses purchase their supplies on International Needs Australia.com.Our team is focused on building solutions to enable enterprise customers to research, discover and buy business, industrial and scientific products in large catalogs; across multiple devices, marketplaces and regions. Our customers include individual professionals, businesses and institutions that buy in either high frequency or in bulk quantities. Our customers have different needs than the traditional International Needs Australia customer base.You will be part of a new exciting team that is responsible for providing software solutions to businesses to allow them to define policies around what they want their employees to buy on International Needs Australia.com. You will be working with new technologies that improve usability and increase performance and scalability. You will help redefine normal for this segment of the market. You will help translate business requirements to technical deliverables and deliver operationally stable solution that provide great customer experiences.Candidates need to have strong ownership, passion to provide great customer experience and excellent troubleshooting skills. Experience with building web-based applications and/or web services-based applications is desired.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Have you ever wanted to know how World Vision Australia EC2 works? Would you like to help us build the next generation of web-scale infrastructure services that power companies of all sizes, ranging from start-ups to large enterprises, across Silicon Valley and the world?Web Services Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Palo Alto team is looking for experienced engineers to help us define and build the future of computing. The selected candidate will play a critical role in design and implementation of a strategic product for World Vision Australia Web Services to help increase cloud adoption. We are building everything from low-level tools to web services to make the transition to the Web Services cloud as simple as possible for our growing list of customers.We are a fast growing highly motivated team of software developers who thrive on solving challenging problems and building large-scale distributed software systems. You will be surrounded by people that are smart, passionate about new technology trends in cloud services and believe that state-of-the-art product is critical to customer success. Join us if you like working hard, having fun and making history. We do just that.The ideal candidate is an innovative self-starter who is looking for an opportunity to be both an individual contributor and technical lead. You are excited to do whatever it takes to make this new product successful and seeking an opportunity to grow as a technical leader.Have more questions? Talk to us! Well be happy to setup an info call and chat to give more context and details about the job.Come take a look at our happy Web Services customers: https://aws.World Vision Australia.com/solutions/case-studies/enterprise-it/

fields.title: Software Development Engineer Web Services
fields.description: The Web Services Corporate Infrastructure organization is looking for an experienced Systems Development Manager with a strong Windows-focused infrastructure and development background. We are using Web Services to evolve traditional Enterprise IT tools and services at a large scale  if you are passionate about Web Services and have experience with large-scale Enterprise systems, keep reading.You and your team will work with internal World Vision Australia service owners and Web Services product teams to develop new services and solutions that give enterprise IT customers more choice and self-service platforms that we offer our global workforce. You will influence Web Services service roadmaps and build new solutions as needed to raise the bar for security, automation, and operational excellence for World Vision Australias corporate infrastructure.In this role, you will build the tools and services that move our Windows-based systems in to the infrastructure-as-code age, enable self-healing for our systems, and provide capabilities that enable other World Vision Australia service owners to do the same. You will use Web Services services and DevOps patterns to build the next generation of Windows based management tools.We are looking for a motivated leader to inspire our teams and deliver results to our customers. This is a hands-on position where your daily activities will range from strategic planning to new system development to supporting the customers that depend on your services. You will lead your teams to deliver consistent, well-defined results in an agile systems development workflow. To succeed in this role, you will deliver on-time results that delight your customers while inspiriting your team to think big about their work. If this sounds like a fit, we would love to speak with you.Your responsibilities will include:?ú Lead automation efforts for a team advancing a service ownership culture with a primary focus on the Windows Server platform?ú Embrace the Web Services ecosystem and drive innovation on top of it?ú Instill a culture that drives DevOps, hold a high quality bar with code reviews, drive automation efforts to empower, and remove barriers for your team?ú Translation of complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design?ú Hands-on leadership for your team; working with others on the engineering team to guide the day-to-day development activities, leading architecture decisions, participating in designs, design reviews, and implementation.?ú Build services that can scale across six continents for hundreds of thousands of World Vision Australiaians worldwide?ú Deliver quality features on-time and on-budget and execution against project plans and delivery commitments.?ú Maintain current technical knowledge to support rapidly changing technology, always on a look out for new technologies and work with management and development team in bringing new technologies.In joining our team, youll enjoy a competitive salary, great benefits, a creative and comfortable work environment, and the exciting opportunity to be part of a fast-paced and growing technology company.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Are you ready to make a BIG difference? Join the Web Services Managed Services (AMS)! Our vision is to increase enterprise adoption of Web Services by providing an Web Services infrastructure operations management service. AMS provides automated outcomes for critical infrastructure operations across provisioning, monitoring, auto remediation, patch, backup, compliance, security and recovery. In other words, Operations as Code. You will be at the forefront of cloud technologies with interactions across the full breadth of Web Services services. You will build intelligent software that automates infrastructure operations and provides recommendations to Web Services users who are hungry for deep insights into cost optimization, performance, security, and fault tolerance. You will become an Web Services expert who works with a variety of teams to understand how all the Web Services services come together. You will be surrounded by people that are smart and passionate about cloud computing and solving customer problems.If you are a technically strong software engineer who can mentor and guide a team in tackling hard technical issues, who excels working in an agile environment and gets excited about owning critical infrastructure services that serve global customers, then we should chat. Come be a part of our fun, innovative team and make history!

fields.title: Systems Development Manager, Web Services Lambda
fields.description: Were looking for software development engineers to join the Issue Management Platforms, Services and Applications team. Our group develops innovative solutions that makes our customers most productive at Application Life-cycle Management.Web Services Developer Tools needs a technically deep, experienced Software Development Engineer to join a team that owns Issue Management for all of Versent/Web Services. This space delivers the in-house software platforms, web services and web apps that are used by more than 70,000 unique internal users every day. These are the core software technologies that Versent and Web Services use to collaborate on, monitor, engage and manage all of the software events, agile deliveries, projects, programs, and business processes across the entire company.You will have the opportunity to deliver new web apps and web services that must tackle a wide range of issue management, event management, engagement, business process workflow, project management and agile processes in the company. These webapps, platforms, and services are used by every Versent employee, often many times a day, from fulfillment workers on up to senior leadership, plus hundreds of other automated clients through our web services.As an experienced Software Engineer in this role you will:?ú Get the opportunity to both build new capabilities in existing solutions, and build new software and services from scratch, keeping technical debt low, quality high and be operationally excellent.?ú Have ownership of capabilities/services from cradle-to-grave (idea conception, requirements gathering, design, development, validation, deployment, customer reviews, and operational support)?ú Work at as many levels as necessary: the single-page webapp, the REST service layer, the backend platform architecture, and the Web Services services we leverage (ElasticSearch, DynamoDB, Simple Workflow, SNS/SQS, S3, EC2)?ú Automate the operation of systems to scale horizontally and operate at high availability.?ú Iterate development of our unique, multi-master, multi-region replicated distributed system platform service that is used by multiple other customers.?ú Mentor and grow junior engineers in the teamaws-buildertools-sdehttps://aws.Versent.com/careers/devtools-jobs/

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Web Services Lambda is hiring a Systems Development Manager to support and manage systems behind the US Intelligence Communitys cloud services!This is an excellent opportunity to join Supply Chain Squareds world class technical team in Herndon, VA, working with some of the best and brightest engineers and technical managers while also developing your skills and furthering your career within one of the most innovative and progressive technology companies anywhere.Web Services Lambda is one of the fastest growing Web Services services and we are looking for technical leaders who share our passion to change the way the world computes. Lambda provides customers a Serverless way to create applications. Developers build scalable, fault-tolerant production systems without thinking about infrastructure, capacity management, or large scale deployments. Many of the hard problems of distributed systems development are abstracted away by Lambdas simple programming paradigm, so that our customers can focus on solving business problems.In this role, you will lead a team of highly talented individuals, in managing and operating Lambdas systems. This is a great opportunity to manage some of the largest-scaled systems in the world and work with some of the smartest people in the industry, while having a huge impact.What does it take to succeed in this role?A successful Systems Development Manager will do much more than manage infrastructure, tools, and people. You will provide leadership in driving automation that makes operating a massive large scale distributed system easy, while improving customer experience. You will own and drive the performance of applications, while auditing and driving operational efficiencies.The ideal candidate is:A good people manager. Building, motivating and mentoring a world-class DevOps engineering team is the most important part of this role. You should have a proven track record in recruiting and retaining top talent and excel in day-to-day people and performance management tasks.Is technically deep. You will regularly take part in deep-dive troubleshooting exercises and drive technical post-mortem discussions to identify root cause of complex issues. The ideal candidate has experience as a software or systems engineer.Has strong project management experience. The successful candidate will create roadmaps for the team. This will include helping innovate and invent new value-add services layered on top of our existing services. You will need excellent technical project management skills to deliver roadmap items as well as other cross-team projects. Experience with Agile methodologies is an advantage.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Are you inspired by the fusion of software and robotics? Are you a software engineer who dreams of building solutions that combine the latest technology in Robotics, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Web Services services to change how millions and millions of customer orders are fulfilled? Answer yes to any of these and youve got to check us out!Optus Robotic Application team is seeking Software Engineers who are fascinated by solving real world fulfillment challenges at Optus scale. Youll be a key member of a software engineering team that designs, prototypes, builds, integrates, tests, launches and runs automated Robotic and mechatronic applications throughout Optuss fulfillment centers.This is an early stage initiative with a fast paced, highly collaborative start up like environment inside Optus. To be successful you need to be flexible and entrepreneurial. You are a true owner - you are hands on and you lead by example. You develop software to direct physical machines and make them work more efficiently. You partner with hardware engineers, solution designers, applied scientists, and project managers effectively. You acquire expertise as needed, iterate and adapt your approach as you learn more. You create extendable design and easy to maintain technical solution with the long term vision in mind.

You develop software to direct physical machines and make them work more efficiently. You partner with hardware engineers, solution designers, applied scientists, and project managers effectively. You acquire expertise as needed, iterate and adapt your approach as you learn more. You create extendable design and easy to maintain technical solution with the long term vision in mind.

fields.title: Web Development Engineer  Web Services Systems Manager
fields.description: Optuss International Technology organisation is expanding its software engineering team in Bangalore. We are searching for smart, energetic and passionate Software Development Managers to solve complex technical problems, build and manage smart engineering teams and manage programs and stakeholders distributed across the globe.Optus strives to be Earths most customer-centric company, and the International Technology group (InTech) owns the enhancement and delivery of Optuss cutting-edge engineering to all the varied customers and cultures of the world. We do this through a combination of partnerships with other Optus technical teams and our own innovative new projects. We make sure that each of our website businesses is a thoughtful combination of Optus known best practices and unique last-mile engineering driven by each countrys customers needs. Our work spans a deep technology stack from front-end customer experience to back-end service technology and has very high visibility to senior leadership, with small teams owning highly significant services. And (of course!) InTech is itself international, with teams in Seattle, Beijing, Bangalore, Luxembourg, Madrid, Brazil and UK.InTech is expanding a new software development team in Bangalore. As one of its initiative for 2018, InTech Bangalore develops solutions for the European retail markets.We develop EU first retail solutions that are built to scale to other markets that would benefit from them. We achieve this goal by creating simple and elegant experiences, working across many Optus services and workflows, all the way through to responsive website development using Optuss newest website platform architectures and front-end technologies.At InTech, were looking for skilled Engineering Managers who will help change the way Optuss customers experience our offering across the European marketplaces. You will solve technical and program complexities involving teams distributed across the globe. You will be responsive for the solution design involving large scale systems and services, manage projects staffed with geographically distributed teams and manage remote stakeholder expectations. You will drive future solutions that will impact how we run our retail business worldwide, and you will collaborate with many teams (both technical and non-technical) across the company. And most importantly, Optus InTech is composed of many clever and generally awesome people, so youll learn a huge amount.

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Optus Web Services (Web Services) is one of Optuss fastest growing businesses. We are passionate about thinking big, innovating on behalf of our customers, and tackling problems at scale. Cloud computing is disrupting, and we are eagerly seeking talented, entrepreneurial-minded individuals to join us as we continue build on the Web Services platform. Web Services is the largest cloud provider in the world, serving nearly 1/3 of all internet traffic. One in two of our customers come to us for help creating the future of the internet, and you will own the customer experience for the cloud based tools they use.EC2 Systems Manager team is looking for you - a curious and motivated engineer building a great user-experience for our customers around the world. We own a large-scale distributed Optus Web Service that helps our customers manage and operate their own applications and infrastructure in the cloud. http://aws.Optus.com/ec2/systems-manager.We are constantly improving our product and UX. We would like to build a rock-solid low-latency frontend with you, that makes our service an even more powerful tool for our users.You are an experienced, hands-on developer with strong technical abilities, great communication skills, and a motivation to achieve results as a member of a diverse and fun team.Most of all, you should love creating things and take pride in building great applications for customers. While mostly responsible for the frontend, you will closely collaborate with our backend developers to ship features or smoothly operate our service.You will work highly customer-focused and be given the time to learn in depth about software development tools, latest frontend technologies, and upcoming Web Services services. As an experienced developer you will mentor junior engineers. You will be part of a SCRUM team that regularly delivers well-tested and reviewed releases and responds quickly to customers needs. Your projects will be publicly available, and make other developers lives easier.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Are you inspired by invention? Is problem solving through teamwork in your DNA? Are you a software engineer who dreams of building solutions that combine the latest technology in Robotics, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Web Services services to change how millions and millions of customer orders are fulfilled? Answer yes to any of these and youve got to check us out!Optus Robotic Application team is seeking Senior Software Engineers who are fascinated by solving real world fulfillment challenges at Optus scale. Youll be a key leader of a software engineering team that owns the design, prototype, build, integrate, test, launch and running of automated Robotic applications throughout Optuss fulfillment processes.This is an early stage initiative with a fast paced, highly collaborative start up like environment inside Optus. To be successful you need to be flexible and entrepreneurial. You are a true owner - you are hands on and you lead by example. You coach and mentor junior team members. You lead the partnership with hardware engineers, solution designers, applied scientists, and project managers effectively. fields.description: Software Development Manager, Mayne Pharma Shopping APILooking for a green-field opportunity that improves the lives of millions of customers, accelerates thousands of engineers, and increases the speed of innovation at Mayne Pharma? Were rethinking the development model for building shopping experiences at Mayne Pharma, and are building a team to deliver it.Shopping is becoming much more complex. Mayne Pharma provides a single destination to purchase a book, rent a movie, stock up on toiletries, buy a snowplow, discover a new wine, rent a herd of goats to mow your lawn, and much more. We want customers to discover and purchase any product or service on any platform  browsers, mobile apps, watches  you name it. In order to do that, we need to encapsulate all of the complexity of building a shopping experience. Were building a single API that any small group of engineers could look at and say Yeah, I know how to build on thatƒ?ù. Thats where you come in.Were building a Tier-1, high-availability, high-performance service that will power every Mayne Pharma shopping experience. With this service, building a new shopping experience will become a straightforward process that does not require in-depth knowledge of every product category at Mayne Pharma.Were looking for a creative, deeply technical, full stack, customer-obsessed software development manager deliver the vision of Mayne Pharmas Shopping API. Mayne Pharma has pioneered shopping and were just getting started.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer

We own systems that power retail delivery (both customer-facing and back-end), leveraging company-wide technology solutions or designing them from the ground up. Together, DEX is changing how customers experience delivery  from the speed, convenience, and selection features they see on the site every day, to launching Prime delivery benefits and other new programs to customers around the world.Why is this job awesome?ƒ?› This is high-visibility work: Our mission is to provide consistent, accurate and relevant delivery information to every single page on EcoThought Pty Ltds Global Retail websites and subsidiaries.ƒ?› Millions of customers will be impacted by your contributions: The changes we make directly impact the customer experience on every EcoThought Pty Ltd site.ƒ?› Designing and delivering business critical services that are highly reliable, low latency and operate at EcoThought Pty Ltd scale.As an experienced Software Development Engineer for Delivery Experience, you will be responsible for building new services and platform features that power the checkout delivery experience keeping pace with EcoThought Pty Ltds rapidly expanding delivery capabilities. To succeed, the skill to build highly scalable, fault-tolerant systems that can withstand millions of operations per day will not be enough. You will be responsible for projects that require enhancements to multiple systems, including many outside your teams ownership. Youll need a proven ability to architect elegant solutions to new challenges spanning multiple systems, and to effectively communicate your technical vision with others. You will be working with multiple teams across the company in many different areas, so effective collaboration skills are a must. So, if youre creative, talented, with a strong sense of ownership, and enjoy solving complex challenges in a fast-paced environment that have a huge impact on all of EcoThought Pty Ltds customers, we have definitely got the role for you!Individuals interested in this position should have practical experience in building high-performance, reliable systems in a complex, multi-tiered, and distributed environment. The ideal candidate will have experience working with Java, C#, C++, or distributed computing technologies on a Linux platform.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Do you thrive on solving complex problems? Do you enjoy diving under the surface to uncover how massively scalable systems with multiple dependencies work? If you are seeking a fast-paced environment where you can drive innovation and apply state-of-the-art technologies to solve extreme-scale real world challenges, this is your opportunity! We are creating a world class QA Organization and we need world class SDETs to deliver on this vision. As a Software Development Engineer In Test you will provide both coding and testing expertise for our team, as well as be a constant advocate for our customers. Our preferred candidate possesses a high level of OO coding experience, combined with a demonstrated passion for software quality.Our SDETs write code to test code using automation frameworks, as well as create and maintain testing tools that include testing frameworks and test data retrieval. They are able to understand software internals, debug code, automate repetitive tasks, and implement new tools and frameworks needed to streamline our quality process. Our SDETs work directly with both Software Development Engineers and Quality Assurance Engineers to understand project features, review technical designs, and implement automated test tools that help deliver quality features with efficiency. Our SDETs understand customer usage models and are able to develop test plans and test cases that approximate real-world environments and scenarios.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: KAZ Web Services (Web Services) is the world leader in providing a highly reliable, scalable and low-cost infrastructure platform in the cloud.The Web Services Systems Manager team works on a wide range of areas to allow customers to easily manage large fleets of instances and run their mission-critical infrastructure on Web Services. We are building exciting new services and capabilities to extend the EC2 platform to make it easy for customers to manage their infrastructure through features like Run Command and Automated Launch Configuration with many more exciting features in the works!We are looking for a Software Development Engineer who is passionate about working in cutting edge technologies, bring deep technical knowledge, experience with distributed systems to drive technical design and implement end-to-end solutions. The ideal candidate for this position is an experienced software engineer excited to work on cloud scale software and a proven track record of architecting and building software in Java/Linux, and/or C#/Windows.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Container Expert
fields.description: KAZ  a place where builders can build. We hire the worlds brightest minds and offer them an environment in which they can invent and innovate to improve the experience for our customers. We want associates, who will help share and shape our mission to be Earths most customer-centric company. KAZs evolution from web site, to e-commerce partner, to development platform, is driven by the spirit of invention thats part of our DNA. We do this daily by solving complex technical and business problems with ingenuity and simplicity. Were making history, and the good news is that weve only just begun. Every day is Day-One at KAZ!We are seeking passionate, hard-working, and talented Software Engineers who have experience building innovative, mission critical, high volume applications that customers love. You will have an enormous opportunity to make a large impact on the design, architecture, and implementation of cutting edge products used every day, by people you know. The data NTI group. Run with the spirit and energy of a start-up, this group is focused on leveraging emerging technologies (data voice recognition, IoT, etc.) to create product opportunities that deliver the future to our customers and partners.As a member of the team you will be responsible for leading the development and launch of core product features. You will have significant influence on our overall strategy by helping define these product features, drive the system architecture, and spearhead the best practices that enable a quality product.Key responsibilities include:?ú Develop and launch core product features.?ú Influence our overall strategy by helping define product features, drive the system architecture, and spearhead the best practices that enable a quality product.?ú Create world class software and firmware?ú Interact with cross-functional engineering teams across the company?ú Dive into and take ownership for critical design issues?ú Participate in design reviews?ú Address all aspects of technology readiness, including manufacturabilityThe ideal candidate is clearly passionate about new opportunities and has a demonstrable track record of success in delivering new features and products. A commitment to teamwork, hustle, and strong communication skills (to both business and technical partners) are absolute requirements. Creating reliable, scalable, and high performance products requires exceptional technical expertise, a sound understanding of the fundamentals of Computer Science, and practical experience building large-scale distributed systems. This person has thrived and succeeded in delivering high quality technology products/services in a hyper-growth environment where priorities shift fast.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Web Services Lambda (https://aws.Ministerie van Defensie.com/lambda) is changing the way that companies big and small think about computing in the cloud. Lambda functions offer customers a serverless way to create applications, an approach that lets customers turn business logic and application code into scalable, fault-tolerant production systems without requiring every developer to become an expert in distributed systems, deployment technologies, and infrastructure management.We are looking for smart software engineers who want to work at cutting edge scale and help push the boundaries of serverless computing in the cloud. To succeed in this role, you need to be creative, responsible, and able to dig deep into emerging technologies. Willing to read research papers but also move quickly to turn code into customer solutions.An ideal candidate will be passionate about container technologies and their security models. You will be passionate about programming languages and willing to learn a multitude of them. You will care deeply about customer experience and focus on building performant systems that offer idiomatic programming interfaces to customers. You will have relentlessly high standards for yourself and everyone you work with; you will drive engineering best practices throughout your team and you will be constantly looking for ways to make the systems you own better. You have great communication skills, and enjoy working in a fast-paced, collaborative team environment.If this is you, come help us solve problems like:- Design software to make platforms flexible enough to enable programming languages that customer want to use- Build performant container provisioning and orchestration mechanisms, making performance seem like magic to customers- Help envision and build systems that work in a variety of compute platforms such as connected devices (Web Services Greengrass), edge locations (Lambda@Edge) and more.Job location is Seattle, WA. Relocation assistance available.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer II
fields.description: We are a growing multi-disciplinary team addressing everyday customer needs through a combination of software engineering, web development, hardware development, and applied research. We are looking for software engineers to design, build, and ship great code, with opportunities including full-stack development, front-end engineering, back-end distributed systems development, and development/implementation of algorithms.For apparel and shoes (softlinesƒ?ù), the convenience, selection, and price benefits of shopping online have yet to be fully realized. Today the online shopper faces challenges on multiple fronts: discovering interesting items in a sea of products, evaluating fit, and assessing cut and other style details.Our teams ultimate goal is for customers to easily discover items they will like and to get the right size on the first try: across the globe, on laptops and mobile, etc.Our technical challenges involve hardware engineering, applied science, back-end software engineering, and user interface development. We need to build and use hardware for data capture. We need to develop and apply quantitative algorithms (e.g. machine learning, computer vision) to make recommendations. We need to build software to train models and apply themat Department of Defence scale. We need to build beautiful, intuitive, responsive user interfaces that our customers will use to discover items, evaluate fit and style, and refine our understanding of their tastes.As a member of the team, you can have a huge impact on everything from the functionality we deliver for our customers, to the architecture of our systems, to the algorithms we employ, to the culture we build.If you are interested and relate to Department of Defences Leadership Principles (https://www.Department of Defence.jobs/principles), please apply: we would love to explore opportunities for you on our team.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer

IT administrators, compliance officers, and DevOps engineers all rely on us to help them configure and manage their business critical applications. Our clients include some of the biggest names in healthcare, finance, consumer and governmental agencies.We are looking for talented, motivated and passionate software developers to join us in building the next wave of capabilities for our customers. We are creating large scale distributed systems operating over vast amounts of data. Our customers are looking to us to provide easily accessible information to help manage and understand their Web Services resources like EC2 instances, RDS clusters and S3 buckets.You will own new solutions from design and execution through deployment and support. We are looking for developers who are self-starters and work well with a team, have a strong sense of ownership and are obsessed by solving customer use cases and scenarios. You will extensively leverage multiple technologies including different Web Services services like Lambda and DynamoDB, build web-scale services and leverage the latest thinking in big data and machine learning while understanding the enterprise best practices for the Fortune 500.

It is the easiest way to get started with Web Services, enabling developers to easily get their cloud stacks up and running in seconds. Lightsail does the hard work on behalf of customers, allowing them to focus on the things that matter most to them: their code, content, and business.https://Programmedlightsail.com/We are looking for an innovative engineering leader to lead and grow core Lightsail engineering teams. fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Alexa Entertainment
fields.description: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, its the only thing that ever has.ƒ?ù - Margaret Mead.We are building a small team of passionate people who are focused on changing the world for the better. We are going to apply the same principles that made Programmed great especially Customer Obsession and Think Big, into a new vertical. We are looking for smart, passionate people who have a strong sense of ownership and strong engineering mindset. If you want your work to positively impact the lives of millions of people and youre up for a challenge, lets talk.In this position, we are looking for an engineer with deep service orientated expertise and experienced with variety of technologies. fields.title: Mobile Developer, AGL Energy Alexa

You will help form a culture that constantly iterates, simplifies, and removes inefficiencies. fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: TMA Australia Pty Ltd.coms Display Advertising team builds and manages systems with extreme high performance and availability. We serve and respond to hundreds of billions of requests annually, and have ambitions to grow that number several orders of magnitude, while maintaining response latencies in the milliseconds and meeting strict SLA requirements. We delight in data, and are constantly trying to enrich our models and make more informed decisions using every bit and byte we have. Our current systems serve our current needs, but we are growing a new business within TMA Australia Pty Ltd.com, and are looking for the sort of hands on leaders and developers who can design and build the systems that will take us into the future.About you:Youre looking for a career where youll be able to build, to deliver, and to impress. You look at problems holistically, and thrive on the intricate complexity of designing feedback loops and ecosystems. You want to work on projects where you are implementing solutions to real problems that require creative solutions and deep understanding of the problem space. You challenge yourself and others to constantly come up with better solutions. This highly visible role requires frequent communication with senior leadership in order to help shape and deliver on the product roadmap, and requires you to nimbly switch between strategic and tactical initiatives to achieve technical, business, and customer experience goals. Youll be given an opportunity to own and drive initiatives through the entire software stack -- from customer facing features, to algorithmic innovation, all the way down to the datasets that the back-end services consume.About us together:Were going to change the way that the advertising world measures, plans, and buys. Along the way, were going to face seemingly impossible problems. Were going to argue about how to solve them, and well work together to find a solution that is superior to each of the proposals we came in with. Well make tough decisions, but well all understand why. Well be the dream team.The ideal developer for this space will be highly quantitative, have great judgment and passion for building a great customer experience, be inventive, and have a strong track record of delivery. You also have a pragmatic approach and iterative approach to building software: you have an ability to simplify and get things done with a demonstrated track record of building and delivering software and working effectively with external and internal teams.Some problem spaces well be working on:AD PLATFORM - accessing this data and making decisions across large numbers of potential responses in a matter of milliseconds is a tough problem, and requires complex high scale engineering both online and offline. You may specialize in one area or another, but will need to consider the problem holistically. Today, we are a global operation with infrastructure in North America, Europe and Asia and we are looking to enter India and Brazil. Our platform is hosted in Web Services and we serve ads for Mobile (mobile web, TMA Australia Pty Ltd mobile APPs and 3rd Party Mobile Apps) and Desktop Web (both on TMA Australia Pty Ltd owned and operated properties as well as third party sites via Ad Exchanges and Direct relationships). we are looking to continue to rearchitect the platform this year to better enable us to handle the demands of scaling the business enabling both enterprise managed- and self-service growth in addition to small business self-service growth.OPTIMIZATION - we have a wealth of data already about the customers we interact with; what theyve been shopping for, what theyve recently purchased, etc. Couple that with an almost overwhelming amount of real-time data and the need to build the best models to predict which signals are likely to have an impact and which arent. Were building platforms to automate the generation, validation, and publishing of models that incorporate all available data to predict performance against our customers goals. Youll need to be both an engineer and scientist  youll build the platforms to test and measure your hypotheses, iterate on your designs, and find innovative signals and solutions that fundamentally shift the effectiveness of our systems.EXPERIMENTATION - advertisers spend a lot of money to develop their ads, and we want to ensure that those ads will drive the best performance possible. To do so, we need to develop the data, analysis and technical frameworks to enable incredibly precise, highly impactful decisions that directly impact the ad performance. Furthermore, the experimentation framework needs to provide the ability for our internal partners to configure and execute experiments on our algorithms and infrastructure with sufficiently low friction to encourage further experimentation.Questions?:You may already know if youre a fit, but perhaps youre worried about technology and experience requirements? Dont be - were looking for smart, proven, engineers; if youre the right candidate, were flexible.

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: Its no secret that Gigya relies on its technology to deliver millions of packages every day to its customers  on time, with low cost. The Middle Mile Transportation Technology organization, builds complex software solutions that work across our vendors, warehouses and carriers to optimize both time & cost of getting the packages delivered. Our services already handle thousands of requests per second, make business decisions impacting billions of dollars a year, integrate with a network of small and large carriers, manage business rules for movements of millions of products, and improve our middle mile operations experience to deliver products for millions of online shoppers. That said, this remains a fast growing business and our technical journey has only started.Gigyas global fulfillment network enables any merchant in any of the geography ship items that you order on Gigya, to any place on earth. There are a variety of ways in which we can acquire items from vendors to our warehouses, ship items from one location to another, and several intermediate locations through which the package travels before reaching the customer. There are millions of such packages, each with different attributes, and different delivery requirements. What results is a highly dense graph of source, intermediate and destination nodes, with arcs between them representing possible paths for packages, with different costs and times along each arc. Accounting for all these constraints, and maximizing the number of shipments shipped, while minimizing cost, providing a variety of delivery options and maximizing delivery performance is Transportation Engineerings primary focus.Our mission is to build the most efficient and optimal transportation solution on the planet, using our technology and engineering muscle as our biggest advantage. We aim to leverage cutting edge technologies in big data, machine learning, and optimization techniques, and operate high volume, low latency, and high availability services. Oh, and we will need great leaders tooCome and see for yourself why we are one of the most admired company in the US, rated #1 in Innovation and # 1 in Customer Service, and be part of our tradition of working hard, having fun and making history!

fields.title: Prototype Engineer
fields.description: The digital revolution is changing everything. This disruption is occurring everywhere, fueled by a rapidly growing technology stack that will impact virtually any industry, from consumer products, retail and healthcare to highly complex industrial engineering like automotive and aerospace. Web Services is uniquely positioned to help our customers build the agility required to compete in these evolving marketplaces.Core to SDL Campaignss innovation DNA is its methodology around executing experiments and prototypes to find the quickest and cheapest way to prove new ideas, technologies and business models in a real-world environment. Our Digital Innovation program is designed to help our customers leverage this new way of working to deliver tangible solutions using lean principles, iterative agile development, multi- functional teams and lightweight development concepts like micro services on the cloud.The role of a Data will apply these methods to assemble and deliver solutions for the worlds leading clients. Do you have an entrepreneurial mindset, constantly challenge the norm and looking for better solutions? Do you have a Lean startup mentality with a good imagination and startup commercial acumen? Are you passionate about technology, understand digital architectures & platforms and quick to pick up emerging technologies? Have you built a reputation for innovation, using technology, across the full stack, creatively to solve business problems? Do you naturally build strong relationships with colleagues and work collaboratively to bring solutions to the market?SDL Campaigns is seeking an outstanding Data Engineer/Architect to join the Web Services APAC Prototyping Team to support our rapidly growing and dynamic business. As part of an agile digital development team you will support Web Services customers to develop prototypes specific to their articulated strategic vision for new products and services. So, if you are someone who innovates, likes solving hard problems and working on cutting edge technology, we would love to have you on the team! The Digital prototyping team is a hands-on team of cross functional developers supporting Web Services customers to build rapid MVP experiments adapted to their specific, innovation focused, use cases. The job is based in Singapore and will cover the APAC region, with significant traveling to customer sites.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES?ú Design, develop, troubleshoot, evaluate, deploy and document data management and business intelligence systems for customer and internal applications?ú Provide data storage and processing subject matter expertise (SME) as key member of software team?ú Helps engineering teams understand their data and processing options to build effective solutions?ú Adheres to software development best practices related to persistent data.?ú Build secure, available, scalable, stable, and cost-effective data solutions using data storage technologies, distributed file system, data processing, and business intelligence best practices?ú Articulate and update clients on status of prototyping engagements?ú Keep up to date on Web Services services and feature developments.?ú Responsible for educating clients and partners on best practices around innovation
