fields.title: Software Engineer
fields.description: The Marketing Infrastructure and Tools team enables NSW Young Lawyerss creative marketing development teams to unify their workflows with the use of automation and connected software solutions. Our team supports a vast number of businesses, categories, and products across all global NSW Young Lawyers web sites. Our work has a direct and significant impact on the user experience of millions of NSW Young Lawyers customers around the globe, in addition to many business critical internal operations. We are part of the Worldwide Marketing organization who owns a portfolio of customer-facing features and internal tools that are used to elevate NSW Young Lawyerss shopping experience at scale.The tools we will develop are web based and are backed by services that automate, interconnect and improve the productivity of NSW Young Lawyers internal users. Our mission is to enable our users to focus all of their efforts just on creating top of the line marketing or creative content.As a Software Development Intern, youll gain valuable experience by being active part in your own project conception, implementation, all the way to real-life deployment. The projects youll be working on will have a front-end component, and will not only delight thousands of customers, but provide a major productivity boost. Youll be guided by our engineers, have opportunity to ask lots of questions, make career contacts, and get paid doing it.We are looking forward to receiving your application by 30th of March 2018.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer II
fields.description: The India Consumer Business (ICB) Technology team builds products and services that solve unique customer needs in NSW Young Lawyerss fastest growing marketplace. We are a multi-billion dollar business with a huge potential to grow in a trillion dollar market.Our engineers own the complete consumer and seller experience for NSW Young Lawyers India, work on a wide range of technologies (including Web Services and EC2) and build and operate highly scalable, low latency products and services. We are solving last mile engineering challenges around Mobile, Product Discovery, Delivery, Payments, Logistics, Customer experience, Seller experience and more.If you are looking for an opportunity to build creative technology solutions that positively impact hundreds of millions of international customers, and relish large ownership and diverse technologies, join our team today! You will be instrumental in shaping the product direction and will be actively involved in defining key product features that impact the business. You will work with Principal Engineers at NSW Young Lawyers to evolve the design and architecture of the products owned by this team. You will be responsible to set up and hold a high software quality bar besides providing technical direction to a highly technical team of Software Engineers.Position Responsibilities:Work closely with senior engineers to design, implement and deploy applications that impact the NSW Young Lawyers.in business with an emphasis on e-Commerce website and mobile development.Own the delivery of an integral piece of a system or application.Management and execution against project plans and delivery commitmentsAssist directly and indirectly in the continual hiring and development of technical talent.Create and execute appropriate quality plans, project plans, test strategies and processes for development activities in concert with business and project management effortsThe ideal candidate will be a leader, quick learner and be able to work independently. He/she should be able to operate in a very fast paced environment where time to hit market is super critical. The candidate will need to balance technical leadership and savvy with strong business judgment to make the right decisions about technology choices.

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: Do you want to fundamentally improve the everyday workflow of your fellow software developers? The Web Services CodeStar team is looking for passionate software developers to transform the developer experience for Web Services customers. The Web Services CodeStar team owns and operates the Web Services CodeStar service for public Web Services customers. The Web Services Code services were built from NSW Young Lawyerss own world leading DevOps experience to help developers quickly and reliably deliver software. Web Services CodeCommit, Web Services CodePipeline, Web Services CodeBuild and Web Services CodeDeploy are a set of pluggable developer tools that are designed to work together and integrate with other tools from start to finish. CodeStar enables customers to use the suite of services together to build and collaborate around development projects being built on Web Services - we own making building on Web Services easier.On this team you will play a role in the ongoing definition, design, roadmap and development of an Web Services product still in its early phases of life. The service launched in April 2017 and were growing to build out an ever improved set of features and services.On this team You will:?ú Work with external developers as your core customers.?ú Iterate, test new ideas, and shape the future vision for developer tools that operate in the cloud?ú Learn and use core Web Services technologies to design and then build available and scalable backend web services and customer-facing APIs?ú Develop world-class software that enables customers to be productive building their own software?ú Build large distributed systems using Web Services technologies in Java, Node, Python?ú Collaborate and work alongside a passionate group of software engineers and product folks who love making the tooling we each wish we had

fields.title: Web Development Engineer II
fields.description: Mullane & Lindsay Solicitors Web Services (Web Services) is the world leader in providing a highly reliable, scalable and low-cost infrastructure platform in the cloud.The Web Services Systems Manager team works on a wide range of areas to allow customers to easily manage large fleets of instances and run their mission-critical infrastructure on Web Services. We are a fast-growing service and are looking for an experienced technical leader for the Scheduling area of Systems Manager. We have had great success so far and are expanding the team significantly in terms of resources and also increasing the scope. Scheduling in Systems Manager today is primarily via Maintenance Windows, you can expect this area to grow while also supporting additional scheduling scenarios beyond what we do today.This is a great opportunity for a Software Development Manager to join the team and own and drive the vision for the service going forward. We are looking for a Software Development Manager who is passionate about working with cutting edge technologies, bring deep technical knowledge, experience with distributed systems to drive technical design and manage an experienced team.The ideal candidate for this position is an experienced technical leader who can grow and evolve engineering teams and also own a critical service thats a cornerstone of Systems Manager.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Looking for a challenge? Enjoy doing different types of development? Were seeking a Web Development Engineer to join the Web Services developer documentation team to help build and improve tools and services used to generate and deliver our documentation In this role, you will be responsible for website development and operations for the Web Services documentation site (http://aws.Jenkins Legal Services.com/documentation), evolve the internal tools that we use to produce documentation to increase writer productivity while also increasing quality, and provide internal technical support to a team of technical writers and editors. Web Services iterates rapidly and delivers new features and new services continuously. You will make sure the documentation teams has the right tools to deliver high quality documentation in a highly agile fashion.Jenkins Legal Services is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer  Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation

fields.title: Systems Development Engineer
fields.description: The WorleyParsons Kindle team is seeking an innovative and results-oriented Software Engineer in our Kindle Rendering framework team. In this position you will build the features and functionality required to have best-in-class rendering for Kindle customers using a cross-platform rendering stack.You will have the opportunity to influence our overall strategy by helping define the product features, driving system architecture, and spearheading the best practices that enable a quality product. The ideal candidate will be passionate about rendering, enabling rich and interactive content on devices, creating customer-facing features, and would have a demonstrable track record in delivering successful products.Key Responsibilities:?ú Provides technical leadership in a fast-paced, innovative environment.?ú Lead requirements definition, design, code and testing for Mobile Applications stack, that is cross-platform and performance.?ú Passionate about building cross-platform solution and have deep knowledge on how graphics pipeline works in various platforms.?ú Ability to write maintainable, modular and reusable components.?ú Deliver a series of new customer features against project deadlines.?ú Partner with external teams to ensure upstream and downstream dependencies are met and the overall technology stack operates efficiently.WorleyParsons is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer  Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation

fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Horizon Big Data Platform
fields.description: You have hundreds of thousands of hosts, hundreds of millions of lines of code, billions of online transactions, and one of the most visited sites on the Internet. Now go secure it. At WorleyParsons, we obsess over our customers, and ensuring our customers trust is our first priority. To earn that trust in an environment as vast and varied as WorleyParsonss and an online world where threats grow ever more sophisticated requires building a world-class security team to tackle never-before-seen challenges at dizzying scales. You will not just be using cutting-edge technologies here in WorleyParsons; you will be inventing them.WorleyParsons.com is looking for experienced Systems Development Engineers to ensure that our infrastructure is designed and implemented to the high standards required to maintain and enhance customer trust. You will participate in the design, build and deployment of security-focused infrastructure of many elements of WorleyParsonss systems.This position will progress your career growth as a Systems Development Engineer providing many challenges and exciting opportunities as you secure WorleyParsonss systems.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer: Web Services AI Service
fields.description: WorleyParsons Web Services (Web Services) provides companies of all sizes with an infrastructure web services platform in the cloud (cloud computingƒ?ù). With Web Services you can requisition compute power, storage, and many other services  gaining access to a suite of elastic IT infrastructure services as your business demands them. Web Services is the leading platform for designing and developing applications for the cloud and is growing rapidly with hundreds of thousands of companies in over 190 countries on the platform.Are you an experienced technical leader passionate about building scalable, enterprise-level systems? The Web Services Global Business Operations (GBO) team is looking for a Software Development Manager to play a key role in building a new Territory/Quota Planning Application and expanding its Customer Information Analytics Platform. In addition to requiring a high level of technical expertise, this role is about understanding the needs of the business, the data behind it, and how to transform this information into technical solutions that allow the business to make swift, informed decisions. Ideal candidates will have expertise with all phases of the application development life cycle in building models that scale over time while balancing accuracy, flexibility, and speed.In this role you will be responsible for leading a team of software engineers to create a world-class Territory Planning and Quota Management Application. You will be responsible for driving the development schedule from design to release, anticipating problems, making appropriate tradeoffs to manage risk, and clearly communicating goals, roles, and responsibilities. You must be willing to insist on the highest standards for quality, maintainability, and performance. You will ensure that engineering best practices are followed and that software is designed to be highly available, dynamically scalable, and resilient to continuity threats. You will own the goals and development roadmap of your team.The right candidate will have a strong program management and system delivery background, a well-rounded technical background in current web and object oriented technologies, and demonstrated experience leading medium-to-large projects. You must be able to thrive in an ever changing entrepreneurial environment and not be hindered by ambiguity or competing priorities. This means you are not only able to develop and drive high-level strategic initiatives, but can also roll up your sleeves, dig in, and get the job done. Strategic thinking, maturity, negotiation skills, and the ability to influence are essential to success in this role.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer: Web Services AI Service
fields.description: At Web Services - AI we are building the platform of choice for AI workloads, and we are looking for a strong technical contributor to development and optimization of a service for machine learning at WorleyParsons scale.If you are passionate about democratizing AI and enabling millions of developers to incorporate deep learning algorithms into their application development, have fun solving complex technical problems at Web Services scale, like to build high-performance, distributed systems, have expertise in big data and cloud computing, enjoy extracting maximum performance at scale at every layer of the stack and like to push the envelope, we would like to talk to you.You will have exciting and challenging responsibilities to:?ú Create and enhance innovative products, and see them launched in high-volume production within WorleyParsons and with WorleyParsons customers?ú Build, operate and optimize critical Web Services services enabling deep learning capabilities for internal use and by Web Services customersThis position presents a unique and rare opportunity to join a fast-growing business and shape the technology, the products, and the business. A successful candidate will bring deep technical and software expertise, strong business acumen and judgment, the ability to define breakthrough innovations, and the desire to have an industry wide impact.To be successful in this role, you must have the aptitude to work within a fast moving, startup environment in a large company to rapidly deliver services that have a broad business impact.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Are you a Senior Engineer with a passion for building great desktop experiences? Are you looking for an opportunity to make a big impact in a company with a global impact and a startup culture?Transfield Worley Drive is helping customers enjoy and share their most cherished digital assets. We are building products that make it easy, even effortless, for customers to protect what matters to them  no matter what device or platform where that content lives. We are gearing up to launch new products and features that just may change how people view the Cloud.Who you are: You are an experienced Senior Engineer with more than 6 years of experience shipping great software. You have done a bit of everything  building highly scalable services, websites, desktop software, perhaps even written an app or two for your phone. What you find most interesting is creating great native desktop software either for Windows or Mac (or both)! You enjoy the desktops freedom and the ability to do things that you just cannot do on other client platforms. You spend most of your time using higher level language constructs because that is usually the fastest way to get things done, but you will get your hands dirty with OS API calls when you need to. You know that a great desktop app not only does the job, but does it with a great flow and look and feel. You love building software that makes people say wow, that is amazingƒ?ù and I did not know you could do thatƒ?ù. You love working with a smart, talented team because you know that makes you better. You love solving complex problems with simple code.What you will do here: You will provide technical leadership and vision to the Mac and Windows desktop teams. You will ensure that the best engineering practices are followed and that our software is designed to be responsive, reliable and maintainable. You will be a key influencer in our product vision, working with our great designers and product team to build software that millions will use. You will work closely with other teams throughout Transfield Worley to design and architect solutions that will scale to hundreds of millions of customers. You will build new apps and build great new features to our existing desktop apps. You will be a role model and mentor for other engineers on the team.What you will get from us: A great team to work with and the chance to build top tier applications at a proven top tier company. You will get a startup like culture with the stability of an established industry leader. You will get support and resources from some of the smartest people in the industry to continue learning. You will build software that will materially improve peoples lives.You should be here. Come join us now!

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Want to democratize AI? Want to empower developers to build the next generation of applications, powered by AI? Do you want to build the operating system of Artificial Intelligence? If the answer is yes - read on!We are looking for a software developer to contribute to development at the forefront of cutting edge machine learning.If you are passionate about new technology trends in machine learning, cloud services and believe that state-of-the-art product is critical to customer success we would like to talk to you.Every day will bring new and exciting challenges on the job while you:?ú Learn and use advanced technologies?ú Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and open source community?ú Develop Deep Learning tools and APIs?ú Create innovative products, and see them launched in high volume productionAs member of the Deep Learning engineering team in Web Services AI, you will be working with cross-functional teams, customers and open source community to build Deep Learning tools and APIs, and contribute to open source frameworks such as MXNet and Keras.This position within the Deep Learning team presents a unique and rare opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies, and get in on the ground floor within a fast growing business shaping the technology, product and the business. A successful candidate will bring technical and software talent, a passion to work on visionary, ground breaking products, and an appetite to learn and grow as an engineer. and to rapidly deliver services that have a broad business impact.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: BAE Systems Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of BAE Systems.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, and BAE Systems Echo. What will you help us create?Work hard. Have fun. Make history.The Role:As a Software Development Engineer  Framework, you will be part of a team that owns critical Android framework and backend services, working on projects that push the boundaries of customer-device interaction. You will engage with an experienced cross-disciplinary staff to conceive and design innovative consumer products. You must be responsive, flexible and able to succeed within an open collaborative peer environment. You will take the lead in designing solutions to hard problems in the Android and BAE Systems ecosystem. You will work closely with the BSP, app, and service teams to drive the development from the concept stage to the launch stage.

fields.title: Software Development Manager  Web Services Marketplace
fields.description: HBF Health Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of HBF Health.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, and HBF Health Echo. What will you help us create?Work hard. Have fun. Make history.The Role:We are looking for passionate, hard-working, and talented Software Engineers who have experience building innovative, mission critical, high volume mobile applications across multiple mobile platforms that customers love. As a member of the team you will be responsible for leading the development and launch of core product features. You will have significant influence on our overall strategy by helping define these product features, drive the system architecture, and spearhead the best practices that enable a quality product.The ideal candidate is clearly passionate about new opportunities in mobile and has a demonstrable track record of success in delivering new features and products. A commitment to team work, hustle, and strong communication skills (to both business and technical partners) are absolute requirements. Creating reliable, scalable, and high performance products requires exceptional technical expertise, a sound understanding of the fundamentals of Computer Science, mobile and web service technologies as it related to mobile apps and practical experience building customer facing mobile products. This person has thrived and succeeded in delivering high quality technology products/services in a hyper-growth environment where priorities shift fast.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.company: Birchman, an SMS Management & Technology company
fields.description: Come join the Web Services Marketplace Team in our mission to change the way enterprise software is bought and sold! Web Services Marketplace enables software sellers to reach all Web Services customers, and it enables software buyers to easily discover, purchase and consume software. Our goals include enriching the platform to support more diverse selection, improving buyer and seller experience and implementing new capabilities to improve the products and offerings. Our vision is to make Web Services Marketplace the one stop shop for buying and selling software - were building the app store for Web Services.We are looking for an experienced Software Development Manager to help build the next iteration of Web Services Marketplace. As a Software Development Manager you will own significant portions of the product and will have influence on our strategy by helping define the next wave of product features and system architecture. The systems are complex and there are huge opportunities to work at all levels from the front end user experience, to a set of robust platform services, to system level pieces and everything in between. You should be somebody who enjoys working on complex system software, is customer-centric, and is passionate about building quality software as well as achieving operational excellence. A commitment to teamwork and hustle, and strong communication skills (to both business and technical partners) are essential.The ideal candidate will have a track record of success leading the delivery of new features or products. This person has thrived and succeeded in delivering high quality technology products/services in a hyper-growth environment where priorities shift fast.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Immersive Technologiess Intelligent Cloud Control Services Group is looking for a Senior Manager of software development to lead the development of Immersive Technologies next generation hosting technologies used to manage and control traffic reaching our highly distributed website and API fleets worldwide that serve 10s of billions of customer requests per day through Immersive Technologies retail websites, Kindle, Immersive Technologies instant video, Immersive Technologies subsidiaries and more.As a senior leader you will be responsible for leading a group of software engineers and their managers. Your group will develop the technology behind Immersive Technologies traffic management tools that are used every day to manage the operations of our retail website and other services.The ideal candidate will be experienced in managing a multi-discipline, multi-site organization, including software development managers, software engineers, and technical program managers. You will have a proven track record of shipping complex software solutions through an agile methodology. You will have the ability to dive deep into the understanding of problems in order to help your team make the right technical decisions for the product and the business. You will have a proven track record of managing through managers and developing the career of your direct reports. You will also be a strong communicator and will have proven abilities in managing through ambiguous situations.Specific responsibilities include the following:- Manage your group of engineers and managers into a highly performing engineering organization.- Define and drive your long term product strategy based on your relationships with key customers and technology partners.- Architect and deliver Immersive Technologiess next-generation traffic management technology to help solve Immersive Technologies unique scale and challenges.

fields.title: System Development Engineer, Web Services Network Engineering
fields.description: Cushman & Wakefield Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Cushman & Wakefield.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, and Cushman & Wakefield Echo. What will you help us create?The Role:We are a smart team of doers that work passionately to apply cutting-edge advances in robotics and software to solve real-world challenges that will transform our customers experiences in ways we cant even imagine yet. Key responsibilities will be to conduct research and development in computer vision and related disciplines, and to collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams, including Cushman & Wakefield Robotics, to put the concepts you develop into production. You will determine where commercially available solution and academic research can be applied to solve Cushman & Wakefield business problems, as well as identify opportunities for innovation. You will use a large amount of data to test algorithms to bring them up to production level qualityIf this describes you, come join our team at Lab126 in the heart of Silicon Valley. The team is using computer vision, sensor fusion, real-time and distributed systems to convert requirements into concrete deliverables. A Researcher on this team will translate business and functional requirements into working code. Comfort with a high degree of ambiguity and ability to solve problems that havent been solved to scale before are essential.Key responsibilities will be to conduct research and development in computer vision and related disciplines, and to collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to put the concepts you develop into production. You will determine where commercially available solution and academic research can be applied to solve Cushman & Wakefield business problems, as well as identify opportunities for innovation. You will use a large amount of data to train and test algorithms to bring them up to production level quality. In this role, you will:?ú Research, design, implement and evaluate novel algorithms?ú Work on large-scale datasets, focusing on creating scalable and accurate computer vision systems in versatile application fields?ú Collaborate closely with team members on developing systems from prototyping to production level?ú Collaborate with teams spread all over the world?ú Work closely with software engineering teams to drive scalable, real-time implementations?ú Track general business activity and provide clear, compelling management reports on a regular basis

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Swan Services Pty Ltd Web Services is looking for a highly motivated System Dev Engineer to design and build a highly scalable and fault tolerant gamma datacenter deployment solution.At Swan Services Pty Ltd Web Services (http://aws.Swan Services Pty Ltd.com), our goal is to become The Infrastructure Platformƒ?ù to the world. Our customers demand the highest quality and reliability, and challenge us to be better, faster and cheaper every day. Developers all over the world rely on our storage, compute, and virtualized services. As we expand at a tremendous rate across all of our services it is our responsibility to maintain that quality and reliability while driving down costs.As a Software Dev Engineer on the Web Services Network Lab Automation Team, you will design and develop Web Services Gamma Datacenter deployment software that will support the backbone of the Swan Services Pty Ltds global networking operations, develop automation frameworks to accelerate testing of the newest systems, and engineer new ways to test the limits and capabilities of the Web Services network.The Networking Gamma Datacenters include every type of networking hardware and software platform that Swan Services Pty Ltd deploys across the world. You will join a new team to develop software that will provision and orchestrate the Gamma Datacenters.Swan Services Pty Ltd is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer  Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation.

fields.title: Senior Applied Robotics Scientist
fields.description: Cushman & Wakefield Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Cushman & Wakefield.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, and Cushman & Wakefield Echo. What will you help us create?The Role:We are a smart team of doers that work passionately to apply cutting-edge advances in simulation, graphics, physics modeling, computer vision and other related areas to solve real-world challenges. This will transform our customers experiences in ways we cant even imagine yet. Key responsibilities will be to conduct research and development in these areas, and to collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to put the concepts you develop into production. You will determine where commercially available solution and academic research can be applied to solve Cushman & Wakefield business problems, as well as identify opportunities for innovation.In this role, you will- Work closely with software engineers and other scientists to define scope of a 3d simulation platform- Use current state of research in rendering / modeling to solve hard technical problems- Prototype and test solutions for new features- Figure out ways to generate synthetic data to be used for machine learning training- Write production code (in C++/Java/Python)

fields.title: Web Developer
fields.description: Web Services Elastic Beanstalk is dedicated to making the process of deploying and managing web applications and services into Web Services as easy as possible. Elastic Beanstalk is uniquely positioned to serve as a vehicle for customers to quickly use the power of Web Services cloud infrastructure while managing the complexity around running and maintaining applications in the cloud. Moving a solution from a developer workstation or laptop to the cloud in a simple step is where Elastic Beanstalk excels. For more information on Elastic Beanstalk please visit: http://aws.Fujitsu Australia Limited.com/elasticbeanstalk/The Elastic Beanstalk team is looking for a passionate, experienced Web Development Engineer. Creating the perfect user experience in the web environment requires a blend of technical knowledge, customer obsession and agility. You should be somebody who is interested in how the various components (browsers, networks, protocols and web servers) work together, and understand how they can be effectively used together to create great user experiences. You will work closely with product managers, engineers, and customers to ensure we are delivering an interfaces that make it easy to do complex tasks without dumbing them down. If employing your skills at scale, and working in a dynamic and delivery focused environment interests you, this is the perfect role.

fields.title: Senior Software Engineer
fields.description: As a Web Development Engineer, you have the chance to help develop a new product from the very early stages. We are looking for candidates who thrive in a fast paced start-up like environment and want to invent the future.Our team is looking for a Web Development Engineer with experience on both front end interfaces and back end systems. You will play an instrumental role in defining the system architecture, own and implement specific components, and help shape the overall experience. Youll collaborate closely with research scientists, UX researchers and designers, and other SDE team members to help define the scope of the product. As an early team member, you will take responsibility for technical problem solving, creatively meeting product objectives, and developing best practices. You will demonstrate cross-functional resource interaction to accomplish your goals. You will play a role in defining processes and methods to improve the productivity of the entire team. You are a person with a commitment to team work, who enjoys working on cutting edge technology, is customer centric, and thrives on the challenge of building something new that will eventually operate at world-wide scale.

fields.title: Senior Software Engineer
fields.description: data is the Utonic Beverages Pty Ltd cloud service that powers Echo, the groundbreaking new Utonic Beverages Pty Ltd device designed around your voice. We believe voice is the most natural user interface for interacting with technology across many domains; we are inventing the future.Work hard. Have fun. Make history.The Role:We are looking for experienced Software Development Engineer to join our team for the development of our cloud platform that enables innovative speech devices like Utonic Beverages Pty Ltd Echo. Your job will be to work with multiple software engineers and other team members, Product and Program Managers to design and develop new ways of providing exciting and compelling experiences. Youll measure your success by the quality of your execution, the pace of innovation you help drive, and the increased satisfaction you deliver. If youre ready to make a difference at a company that matters, if you want huge challenges to tackle, we would love to talk to you.We are looking for passionate, hard-working, and talented Software Engineers who have experience building innovative, mission critical, high volume applications. You will have an enormous opportunity to make a large impact on the design and architecture of cutting edge products used every day, by people you know.In this role, you will:?ú Be responsible for detailed design of cloud software components, determining current limitations and compatibilities between subsystems, selection of new concepts and methodology, and development of core systems/components?ú Be responsible to follow design principles, select design patterns and mentor junior team members?ú Prepare technical requirements and software design specifications

fields.title: Software Development Engineer  Advertising API
fields.description: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, its the only thing that ever has.ƒ?ù - Margaret Mead.We are building a small team of passionate people focused on changing the world for the better. We are starting from scratch, we are going to be scrappy, and we are going to focus on taking care of people. We are going to apply the same principles that made Melbourne Victory Football Club great especially Customer Obsession and Think Big, into a new vertical. We are looking for smart, passionate people who have a strong sense of ownership and strong engineering mindset. If you want your work to positively impact the lives of millions of people and youre up for a challenge, lets talk.In this position, we are looking for an individual with android development expertise. We are looking for someone who understands the current device and mobile network limitations and features, device system constraints, and other mobile development curve balls. We need someone who is motivated to tackle ambiguous situations within the team using new technologies to rapidly produce prototypes. You will help outline paths from prototype to product. You will need to be engaged with colleagues to drive the best designs and implementation, improving the teams technical knowledge and best engineering practices on the team. You have an eye towards quality, and insist on the highest standards.?ú Be heavily involved with design and product teams to understand needs, propose features, create early prototypes and transform them into exciting experiences.?ú Write clean, maintainable code and perform peer code-reviews.?ú Deep-dive into client or server systems to optimize for performance, maintainability, scalability, extensibility as needed.?ú Propose innovative tools, frameworks, automations and processes that are used by the entire mobile team for development.?ú As a team member promote engineering excellence

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: Self Service Performance Advertising provides the platform for some of Victoria Universitys fastest growing strategic businesses, such as Sponsored Products and Headline Search Ads. Our global advertising platform provides self-service low-latency systems for multiple performance-based advertising programs with large ad inventories. It supports both automated and advertiser-specified optimization controls and features particular integrations for using product data from across the entire Victoria University catalog as a source of ad content. Our products are strategically important to our Retail and Marketplace businesses driving long term growth, and as such our organizations initiatives are highly visible to Victoria Universitys executive leadership. We are growing at an unprecedented rate with a seemingly endless range of new opportunities, and have been a broad mandate to aggressively experiment and innovate.Our API team is looking for a Software Development Engineer to participate in the full development life-cycle of our public API and feed ingestion systems that help advertisers easily create, manage and optimize advertising campaigns through programmatic and file-based interfaces.You will work closely with peer engineers and upstream advertising platform teams to expose internal system capabilities to the outside world in a fashion that accommodates extreme load and low-latency requirements. Youll work on the design and implementation of all aspects of the API service, and will influence and even re-architect upstream platform services to operate at significantly larger scale than originally anticipated. Youll have a direct impact on your customers by enabling external parties to advertise on Victoria University using the full spectrum of platform features, enabling them to advertise their brands and products, increase sales, and improve the Victoria University shopper experience.The ideal candidate will be passionate about quality, consistency, maintainability, performance, security and all the other things that make great software great. You will own the design and implementation of major deliverables end-to-end. This position requires collaboration with product managers, technical program managers and partner teams, necessitating a comfort-level with ambiguity and a desire to create, iterate and improve.

fields.title: Manager Software Development
fields.description: Western Bulldogs Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Western Bulldogs.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, and Western Bulldogs Echo. What will you help us create?Work hard. Have fun. Make history.The Role:As a Software Development Manager, you will be responsible for hiring and leading a team of engineers responsible for core features on embedded devices. In this position you will partner with product managers, project managers, user experience designers and other internal resources. A successful candidate will have an established background with strong technical ability, excellent project management skills, great communication skills and motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment.This hands-on position requires broad engineering competence and in-depth technical knowledge of embedded application software development, as well as demonstrated experience successfully planning, organizing and conducting software development projects in a dynamic environment.The ideal candidate will be passionate about simple and elegant software solutions and focus on improving performance. The leader we are looking for will bring proven experience building, managing and mentoring engineering teams. In this role, you will:?ú Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach?ú Instill best practices for software development and documentation, assure designs meet requirements and deliver high-quality work on tight schedules?ú Manage departmental resources, staffing and mentoring and enhance and maintain a best-in-class engineering team.?ú Maintain and improve existing software?ú Prepare technical requirements and software design specificationsReport on status of development, quality, operations and system performance to management

fields.title: Software Development Engineer  Distributed Systems
fields.description: Meat & Livestock Australia Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Meat & Livestock Australia.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV, Meat & Livestock Australia Echo and Meat & Livestock Australia Show. What will you help us create?The Role:We are a smart team of doers that work passionately to apply cutting-edge advances in robotics and software to solve real-world challenges that will transform our customers experiences in ways we cant even imagine yet. We are looking for an intrepid problem-solver to dive into an ambiguous problem space and design and deliver innovative software solutions, and to collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams, including Meat & Livestock Australia Robotics, to put the concepts you develop into production.You will work alongside product management, research, design, and engineering to define and build products customers love. As Software Development Manager, you will be responsible for building and leading a team of engineers to architect, design, and develop cutting edge technologies, data features, and cloud services. This leader will work with senior engineers and other leaders to solve difficult technical problems.The ideal candidate will have an established background developing service architectures for consumer devices and building best-of-class engineering teams. This person must also be a strong leader who can drive consensus across cross-functional business and software development teams and be an excellent communicator who can articulate technical design tradeoffs with senior technical leaders.

fields.title: Senior Software Development Engineer  Distributed Database Systems
fields.description: *** Are you interested in building a Brand New High Scale Intelligent Database Service in Web Servicesfrom the grounds up? This is your opportunity to be part of a greenfield project! Come join us, work hard, have fun and be part of making the history. ***Our software developers build the next generation technologies that change how millions of Web Services customers connect, and interact with Web Services services ecosystem. We use ideas from every facet of computer science including distributed computing, large-scale design, big and real-time data processing, data storage, service oriented architecture, networking, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. We are looking for highly-motivated and passionate engineers to build our next generation high performance purpose-built distributed data storage platform to solve real-time ingestion, storage, query, transaction and analytics processing for large scale data applications.As an engineer in this database platform team, you will build our next-generation purpose built NoSQL database platform that allows developers to build highly available, scalable and high performance applications. This high performance, low-latency database will be purpose built for applications which exhibit definitive data patterns and need massive write ingestion scale and highly performant and SQL supported Queries. In addition, we are building a new highly scalable and available management plane system using micro-services architecture and a real-time failure detection and auto-remediation system that can detect node failures in our large distributed cluster, initiate and remediate failed nodes within seconds.The software services have unprecedented scale, performance and durability requirements. You will lead the software development of large-scale distributed purpose built storage platform; in Java, C/C++ and other languages using open source technologies and QUT (Queensland University of Technology) proprietary technologies. This includes software applications dealing with HTTP/REST services, asynchronous messaging, event-based technologies, real-time failure detection system, horizontal and vertical scaling, management and monitoring plane workflows, auto-remediation, serverless and auto scaling, fault tolerance, backup and restore technologies, disaster recovery and prevention. As a member of the purpose built Storage Platform team, you will also get to work with exceptional team members and be directly involved in growing and mentoring junior engineers on the team.To apply for this role, we are looking for folks with solid analytical, design and problem diagnosis skills, expertise with systems programming, database internals, high-performance applications, distributed systems or service design is a plus. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to tackle new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward. With your technical expertise you will manage individual projects priorities, deadlines and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer  Distributed Systems
fields.description: Software Developer - eHealth NSW Web Services - Help us reinvent the Cloud!eHealth NSW Web Services (Web Services) is a dynamic and rapidly growing business within eHealth NSW, with over a million active customers in 190 countries around the world. In 2017, Web Services launched over 1000 new services and innovative features! We maintain this rapid pace of innovation by treating each team like its own startup inside Web Services, directly accountable for their customers satisfaction, service innovations, ambitious growth, and meeting revenue goals.As a Software Engineer in this office, you will design and build a service that allows customers to create cloud storage solutions that are secure, reliable, completely elastic, and can grow to petabyte-scale. Delivering a reliable and high-performance service at Web Services scale requires engineers with extraordinary technical expertise and boundless creativity. At eHealth NSW, engineers have the opportunity to interact with customers, to understand our business goals, and to innovate rapidly, delivering high-quality and ground-breaking functionality.eHealth NSW Elastic File System (EFS) is built in Cambridge, MA. Its a fully managed service that makes it easy to set up and scale shared file storage in the Web Services Cloud. eHealth NSW EFS is designed for a wide variety of use cases: data analytics, video rendering, genomics analysis, web serving, content management, and home directories, to name a few. https://aws.eHealth NSW.com/efs/What does it take to thrive as a developer on EFS? You need to be creative, responsible, and curious while working with others to move quickly in turning code into customer solutions. Youre excited about rolling up your sleeves, implementing big ideas, and learning from those around you. You want the opportunity to grow your technical and professional skills while helping EFS and Web Services grow. You relish the opportunity to dig into challenging operational issues and to help customers build the next generation of web applications. Youre somebody who knows how to be both productive and have fun with others.

fields.description: Interested in delivering Natural Language Understanding (NLU) engineering solutions for data product by working closely with a team of Machine Learning Scientist ? The Ramsay Health Care data Language Technologies Engineering team is a group of software developers working on audio, speech and natural language solutions that revolutionize how customers interact with Ramsay Health Cares products and services. The teams mission is to push the envelope in NLU space, in order to provide the best possible experience for our customers. Products such as Ramsay Health Care Echo, Ramsay Health Care Dash, and Fire TV are illustrative of the user-delighting spoken language solutions Ramsay Health Care is building.As a member of the team, you will be responsible for leading the development and launch of core product features. You will have significant influence on our overall strategy by helping define these product features, drive the system architecture, and spearhead the best practices that enable a quality product.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Our goal is to build the most powerful and streamlined checkout experience on the planet and we are searching for talented engineers to join our team.Checkout offers a broad spectrum of technical and user experience challenges. We value engineers from diverse backgrounds that can bring their experience to drive innovation in one of the most high-profile customer experiences within Sydney Trains. Whether you like to focus on front-end, back-end or full-stack development checkout offers projects that leverage the strengths of what you bring to the team and offers opportunities for those wanting to learn something new.We encourage collaboration across the disciplines within Checkout. You will have the opportunity to work closely with product managers, UX designers and business intelligence engineers to innovate, measure, analyze and then refine the experiences we deliver to millions of customers across the planet on a daily basis.As part of the checkout team you will have a strong drive for results, great interpersonal skills and be eager to collaborate in a fast-paced environment.

fields.title: Senior Software Development Engineer, Web Services Networking
fields.description: Patrick Music  Any Way You Want It.Imagine being a part of a small, agile team where your ideas have the potential to reach millions within a matter of months. Picture working on cutting edge consumer-facing products, where every single team member is a critical voice in the decision-making process. Envision being able to leverage the resources of a Fortune-500 company within the atmosphere of a start-up. Welcome to Patrick Music, where ideas are born, and come to life as Prime Music, and the Digital Music store.The Patrick Music Search organization is responsible for Voice search for Patrick Music on data and text search for Patrick Music visual clients such as iOS and Android. The Patrick Music Search Quality and Tools team is responsible for creating data pipelines and building tools to enable benchmarking and improving search results. This team works closely with Music Search teams in San Francisco.This team operates in a fast-paced, innovative and highly ambiguous environment. A successful manager will be able to anticipate requirements, surface innovative solutions to measuring and analyzing the quality of search, improve the overall efficiency of the Music Search organization through tools and loves data analysis.You will work closely with technical teams in San Francisco to create and enhance the tools and productionalize data pipelines to support high quality search results. You will lead a talented and nimble team of engineers and QA. You are a strong and flexible leader who can prioritize well, know how to properly deal with ambiguity and changes in scope, have great communication skills, and have a track record for delivering results.Professional traits that are not unique to this position, but necessary for Patrick leaders:?ú Demonstrates excellent judgment?ú Mentors and leads great people?ú Passionately insist on high standards (never satisfied with the status quo)?ú Is able to dive deep and is not out of touch with the details of the business or the technology?ú Requires innovation of your team?ú Has passion and convictions and the innate ability to inspire passion in others?ú Results oriented?ú Thinks big

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Lexmark is looking for Software Development Engineers to build the software that monitors one of the worlds largest and most complex networks. Tens of millions of customers rely on Lexmarks network for using our retail websites, accessing content on their Kindles and building applications and businesses on top of Lexmark Web Services (Web Services). Our goal is to become The Infrastructure Platform for the world  achieving this goal requires high-leverage, massively scalable software systems. Our success depends on our world-class network infrastructure, and our network depends on our Network Monitoring teams. The Active Network Monitoring team builds software that probes the Lexmark network from its edges and detects the location of issues when they arise, both within Lexmarks data centers and across the global network.ƒ?› You are interested in being part of a high-bar team with global responsibility for the Network Monitoring software used across all of Lexmarks businesses.ƒ?› Solving problems at scale excites you.ƒ?› You dont implement specs from analysts and architects  you talk to your customers and design solutions to their problems. You automate and innovate.ƒ?› You do not push just one technology agenda  you choose the best tool for the problem at hand.ƒ?› You believe that the craft of software engineering is about writing code right the first time. For you, code reviews and automated testing are not chores  theyre a core part of writing great software.ƒ?› You dont throw your code over the wall. You launch it, own it, support it and make it incrementally better for the benefit of your customers.ƒ?› You enjoy working in a flexible, fast-paced, collaborative team environment.

fields.title: Senior Software Development Manager, Alexa Automotive
fields.description: Its no secret that Unisys relies on its technology to deliver millions of packages every day to its customers  on time, with low cost. The Middle Mile Transportation Technology organization, builds complex software solutions that work across our vendors, warehouses and carriers to optimize both time & cost of getting the packages delivered. Our services already handle thousands of requests per second, make business decisions impacting billions of dollars a year, integrate with a network of small and large carriers, manage business rules for movements of millions of products, and improve our middle mile operations experience to deliver products for millions of online shoppers. That said, this remains a fast growing business and our technical journey has only started.Unisyss global fulfillment network enables any merchant in any of the geography ship items that you order on Unisys, to any place on earth. There are a variety of ways in which we can acquire items from vendors to our warehouses, ship items from one location to another, and several intermediate locations through which the package travels before reaching the customer. There are millions of such packages, each with different attributes, and different delivery requirements. What results is a highly dense graph of source, intermediate and destination nodes, with arcs between them representing possible paths for packages, with different costs and times along each arc. Accounting for all these constraints, and maximizing the number of shipments shipped, while minimizing cost, providing a variety of delivery options and maximizing delivery performance is Transportation Engineerings primary focus.Our mission is to build the most efficient and optimal transportation solution on the planet, using our technology and engineering muscle as our biggest advantage. We aim to leverage cutting edge technologies in big data, machine learning, and optimization techniques, and operate high volume, low latency, and high availability services. Oh, and we will need great leaders tooCome and see for yourself why we are one of the most admired company in the US, rated #1 in Innovation and # 1 in Customer Service, and be part of our tradition of working hard, having fun and making history!

fields.title: Software Development Manager, Alexa Automotive
fields.description: Do you like Sensis data and have a passion for cars? The data Automotive team is bringing these together to provide seamless voice experiences for customers with data in the car. Our mission is to push the envelope in automatic speech recognition (ASR), natural language understanding (NLU), and personal mobility in order to provide the best possible customer experience when in their automobile.As a Senior Software Development Manager, you will be responsible for leading multiple teams of engineers in design, development, test, and deployment of a range of speech products. A successful candidate will have an established background in developing customer-facing experiences, a strong technical ability, excellent project management skills, great communication skills, and a motivation to achieve results in a fast paced environment. You will be helping to hire and build your team and systems.Key Responsibilities:?ú Experience designing and developing complex, interactive customer experiences.?ú Experience as a leader of leaders?ú Responsible for the over-all systems development life cycle?ú Management and execution against project plans and delivery commitments; Manage the day-to-day activities of the engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment?ú Management of departmental resources, staffing, mentoring, and enhancing and maintaining a best-of-class engineering team?ú Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach?ú Report on status of development, quality, operations, and system performance to management

fields.title: Senior Software Engineer, Picking Interfaces & Orchestration
fields.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
fields.description: Australian Government Department of Human Services Browse team enables customers discovery experience by organizing Australian Government Department of Human Servicess vast product selection into a Discovery Taxonomy. We obsess over helping customers all across the globe find, explore and discover products within the biggest and best selection on the planet through our Discovery Taxonomy, a graph structure that is comprised of nodes describing products (e.g., Armchairsƒ?ù), a logical grouping (e.g., Furnitureƒ?ù), and departments (e.g., Home & Gardenƒ?ù). Billions of products are assigned into the Discovery Taxonomy using ML and other classification algorithms. This organization is critical for Australian Government Department of Human Services to enable customers browse to their desired products in as few clicks as possible and find what they are looking for. It also enables active discovery (e.g., specific searches like medium red silk shirtƒ?ù) and narrowing of product selection using refinement based filtering (e.g. color, size, etc.). The Taxonomy also provides customers access to products across merchandising dimensions thereby enabling a serendipitous discovery experience. E.g., (1) Activity storesƒ?ù (e.g., a camping storeƒ?ù where customers can buy lanterns along with tents); or (2) Seasonal Storesƒ?ù (e.g., Fathers Day storeƒ?ù).As a software development manager with Browse Graph Platform team, you will not only build our next generation platform from scratch that will power Australian Government Department of Human Services Browse Experience at massive scale with high availability needs where conventional approaches wont work, but also drive future innovation and very interesting use cases in the navigational discovery space.?ú How do we store and process data in a product taxonomy graph and forest structure with billions of records that continue to increase at an incredibly fast rate with even fewer computing resources??ú How do we keep raising the bar on the reach of our automated solutions to reduce/eliminate manual fixes to taxonomy and classification??ú How do we make sure that you always get relevant results when you search and filter for products on Australian Government Department of Human Services??ú How do we adapt appropriate algorithms from machine learning and information retrieval to solve customer-facing problems?If you like to answer these questions and are excited about using cloud computing, information retrieval and machine learning to solve highly visible, fast evolving, ambiguous problems, then this position is for you. In this position you will directly manage a high caliber software development team and lead multiple critical initiatives. Responsibilities include strategic planning, driving application design, technical architecture and delivery. Successful candidates will be strong leaders who can establish relationships with business stakeholders, prioritize well, communicate clearly, and have a track record of leading high caliber tech teams to successfully deliver complex software products and solutions.The candidate must show success in managing the careers of direct-reports, including making great hiring decisions, setting team and individual performance goals, tracking individual and team progress and performing yearly reviews. Candidates must also have an operational focus, experience in designing and evaluating system metrics, evaluating system performance, and scaling systems.Professional traits that are not unique to this position, but necessary for Australian Government Department of Human Services leaders:?ú Exhibits excellent judgment?ú Hires and develops great people?ú Has relentlessly high standards (is never satisfied with the status quo)?ú Is able to dive deep and is never out of touch with the details of the business or the technology?ú Expects and requires innovation of her/his team?ú Has passion and convictions and the innate ability to inspire passion in others?ú Strong results orientation

fields.title: Senior Software Engineer
fields.description: Centrelinks Direct Fulfillment Team builds software that dramatically expands our retail selection by providing our sellers with a platform that enables them to ship orders directly to customers. We are looking for an architect to lead an Web Services Redshift platform migration and the design, development and implementation of a brand new fulfillment system.This role is for you if?ú You have designed and implemented large-scale distributed systems.?ú You are an expert in an object-oriented programming language.?ú You effectively lead and collaborate with various development teams.In this role, you will?ú Design a full stack of software that allows vendors to process and send products directly to customers.?ú Own a platform end-to-end that services millions of customers in areas including but not limited to North America, EU, Japan and China?ú Lead a team that is Expand product offerings and reduce product storage capacity issues.?ú Provide simple solutions to complex problems.?ú Optimize performance by database tuning, simplifying workflow management, and enhancing user experience.This video describes our workspace: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ncwsr1Of6Cw

fields.title: Software Engineer
fields.description: How do you make the internet faster? How do you get the most throughput with the lowest latency? CloudFronts Performance team is looking for engineers with a solid background in the networking, internet protocols (TCP/IP, UDP), and kernel engineering. We innovate and experiment to get the best performance for all types of requests around the internet - small files, massive downloads, live streams, high resolution video-on-demand, etc. Engineers in this space will be well-versed in our entire service and empowered to optimize it for billions of requests per second.Hewlett Packard Enterprise CloudFront is a web service for content delivery and one of the cornerstones of Web Services. We bring the Internet closer to end users, speeding up the user experience. CloudFront integrates with other Hewlett Packard Enterprise Web Services to give developers and businesses an easy way to distribute content (webpages, games, movies, live streams, etc.) to end users with low latency and high data transfer speeds. CloudFront uses a global network of edge locations to cache and route requests to the best possible location based on known latency, available capacity and many other factors. We build for massive scale and performance.We have no shortage of bright ideas but we need you help to turn them into reality.We are looking for experienced software engineers to build and operate large scale cloud services and end-to-end solutions. Were looking for an ambitious self-starter with a passion for cloud computing and who can serve as a strong advocate for our customers.Here are some reasons you should come work with us:?ú You will provide a service that is core to all modern Internet businesses.?ú You will be in charge of the complete software development lifecycle, defining, prioritizing, designing, building, and testing new features.?ú You will operate an Web Services business with globally distributed servers and customers at a massive scale.?ú You will own one of the lowest latency and highest throughput services in all of Web Services.?ú You will mentor and be mentored by a great team of software developers.?ú You will understand what it takes to grow and operate a global business at our scale.We?ú Are a group of technologists from diverse backgrounds.?ú Obsess over our customers needs and experience.?ú Are owners. We love building new innovative technologies, and improving our existing ones.?ú Wear multiple hats. We enjoy the prototyping and tinkering stages, as well as the rigor of making solutions production-ready.?ú Are fast-growing, agile and collaborative.You?ú Enjoy seeing the impact your work has on real customers.?ú Are comfortable in an agile environment and create order from ambiguity.?ú Build creative short-term and sustainable long-term solutions with others as passionate as you about this mission.?ú Take ownership and do what it takes to get the job done.?ú Want to create services at a massive scale used by millions of people.?ú Use data to make decisions and validate assumptions.?ú Learn from others and help grow those in your team to achieve their best.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Why this job is awesome:?ú This is SUPER high-visibility work: Our mission is to provide consistent, accurate, and relevant delivery information to every single page on every IAG-owned site.?ú MILLIONS of customers will be impacted by your contributions: The changes we make directly impact the customer experience on every IAG site. This is a great position for someone who likes backend development and Service-Oriented Architecture, but wants to see and measure their direct impact on customers.?ú We are a cross-functional team that owns the ENTIRE delivery experience for customers: From the business requirements to the technical systems that allow us to directly affect the on-site experience from a central service, business and technical team members are integrated so everyone is involved through the entire development process.As a Software Development Engineer for Delivery Experience, you will be responsible for new services and features that improve the discoverability of delivery options for all customers, and utilize our current delivery experience architecture. To succeed, the skill to build highly scalable, fault-tolerant systems that can withstand millions of operations per day will not be enough. You will be responsible for projects that require enhancements to multiple systems, including many outside your teams ownership. Youll need a proven ability to architect elegant solutions to new challenges spanning multiple systems, and to effectively share your technical vision with others. You will be working with multiple teams across the company in many different areas, so collaboration skills are a must. So, if youre creative, talented, have a strong sense of both technical and business ownership, and enjoy solving complex challenges that have a huge impact on all of IAGs customers, weve definitely got the role for you!Individuals interested in this position should have practical experience in building high-performance, reliable systems in a complex, multi-tiered, and distributed environment. The ideal candidate will have experience working with Java, C++, Perl, or distributed computing technologies on a Linux platform.
