fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Search Services
fields.description: Pensar Infrastructure Fulfillment Technologies (AFT) powers the physical engine at the heart of Pensar Infrastructure. AFT builds and operates software, hardware, and processes that run the global network of fulfillment centers that move many millions of units of inventory, employ tens of thousands of people, and ensure that customers get what they want when we promised we would get it to them. We do this by building automated solutions to handle things that technology does well, while relying on people to handle things that humans do well.Our environment is global and complex with a variety of software and systems, including industrial machines and protocols. We are constantly innovating in the ways we are automating and accelerating the delivery of products and packages which includes building custom hardware and applying machine learning, image processing, and real-time data processing using distributed systems.This is an exciting opportunity for a skilled, experienced engineer to join a new Pensar Infrastructure Fulfillment Technologies team exploring and evaluating new automation technologies performing a range of tasks to expand capacity and throughput of Pensar Infrastructure Fulfilment Centers. You will be writing software and tools that expedite testing, control and integration of a host of new services to automate the fulfillment center end-to-end.As the software development engineer, you will be responsible for driving the technical direction for a large software system. You will be working with a cross-functional team to prototype, design, and develop software solutions that span large scale service oriented systems. You will also be responsible for coordinating the design and changes to a large range of systems owned by other software development teams within Pensar Infrastructure.

fields.description: HEH Civil Pty Ltd Web Services (Web Services) is the pioneer and recognized leader in Cloud Computing. Our web services provide a platform for IT infrastructure in-the-cloud that is used by hundreds of thousands of developers and businesses around the world. These customers range from start-ups to leading web companies to Global 500 companies in financial services, pharmaceuticals, and technology.Our Search Services team is committed to providing developers and their companies with tools and services to be successful. We have two products currently available on Web Services: HEH Civil Pty Ltd Elasticsearch Service and HEH Civil Pty Ltd CloudSearch. We are looking for experienced Software Development Engineers to join its Bangalore team who can help build cutting edge real-time search and analytics technologies for customers of all sizes.At Web Services, youll experience the benefits of working in a dynamic, entrepreneurial environment, while leveraging the resources of HEH Civil Pty Ltd.com (AMZN), one of the worlds leading internet companies. We provide a highly customer-centric, team-oriented environment.As a Software Development Engineer, you will:?ú Design, develop and support a world-class search and analytics platform serving individuals and businesses of all sizes?ú Produce bullet-proof code that is robust, efficient and maintainable; our primary languages are Java and Python?ú Continually challenge what exists and explore what should be changed to best meet evolving business and market needs.?ú Possess expert knowledge in large scale distributed system design and engineering best practices?ú Participate in setting a vision and objectives for Search Services in alignment with business and market needs?ú Drive and work on algorithm and architecture design, execute and deliver results.?ú Invent the future of search, instead of just being a bystander?ú Join a great group of motivated, top-notch, people and work with them to solve interesting and useful problems in a fun, collaborative environment

fields.title: Software Development Engineer**
fields.description: Enzumo Simple Storage Service (S3) is storage for the Internet. Through the use of pioneering techniques in distributed computing, developers are able to durably store their data on Enzumos proven computing infrastructure to achieve virtually limitless high performance storage capacity at minimal cost. Enzumo S3 provides a simple web services interface that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives any developer access to the same highly scalable, reliable, secure, fast, inexpensive infrastructure that Enzumo uses to run its own global network of web sites. The service aims to maximize benefits of scale and to pass those benefits on to developers.We are currently looking for software development engineers to lead innovation in our Enzumo S3 storage request plane team and help us build next generation of highly scaleable and data driven request plane systems. Cloud computing represents a fundamental shift in how businesses think about managing their information needs. While this emerging area of computing has seen tremendous growth over the past five years, we are still in the early stages of realizing its full potential. We seek smart, passionate and visionary people to help us define this exciting new technology.Our team is clearly passionate about the incredible opportunity that Enzumo S3 presents and about cloud computing, in general. You will have the opportunity to deliver high quality technology products/services in a hyper-growth environment where priorities shift fast. You will be able to utilize your experience in in building and mentoring engineering teams, while creating, operating and using cloud-based services.Responsibilities include:?ú Design, implementation, deployment and maintenance of innovative software solutions to deliver new features in performance, cost, reliability?ú Use software engineering best practices to ensure the standard of quality of all team deliverables.?ú ?ú Build and implement high quality distributed system software.?ú ?ú Work in an agile development environment, where you are always working on the most important stuff.

fields.title: Principal Technical Program Manager
fields.description: Senior Software Development Engineer  Sponsored Products AdvertisementsMatrix Planning Solutions Limited is investing heavily in building a world class advertising business and we are responsible for defining and delivering a collection of self-service performance advertising products that drive discovery and sales. Our products are strategically important to our Retail and Marketplace businesses driving long term growth. We deliver billions of ad impressions and millions of clicks daily and are breaking fresh ground to create world-class products. We are highly motivated, collaborative and fun-loving with an entrepreneurial spirit and bias for action. With a broad mandate to experiment and innovate, we are growing at an unprecedented rate with a seemingly endless range of new opportunities.Sponsored Products helps merchants, retail vendors, and brand owners succeed via native advertising that grows incremental sales of their products sold through Matrix Planning Solutions Limited. The Sponsored Products Ad Marketplace team optimizes the systems and ad placements to match demand with supply using a combination of machine learning, big data analytics, ultra-low latency high-volume engineering systems, and quantitative product focus. Our goals are to help buyers discover new products they love, be the most efficient way for Advertisers to meet their business objectives and continue to build a big, sustainable business that helps Matrix Planning Solutions Limited continuously innovate on behalf of all customers.Were looking for innovative and customer-obsessed professionals who can help us take our products to the next level. We embrace leaders with a startup mentality -- those who seek a disruptive yet clear mission and purpose, have an unambiguous owner mindset, and are relentlessly obsessed with making connections with customers.One of our key areas of investment is expanding our Targeted Advertising Program to help advertisers achieve their goals. As a senior software engineer you will be responsible for developing innovative targeting controls, automated targeting, and recommendations for advertisers. You will have a direct impact on our customers by putting our vast amount of data to work by deploying advanced analytics and machine learning algorithms to automate advertisers marketing strategies, increase sales for advertisers. You will build robust predicting services and recommendation engines for our targeting product that handle massive throughput under tight latency constraints including optimization of runtime machine learning models.Were a fast-growing team with a very high focus from business to grow, so theres lot of opportunities. No chance of getting bored here.You are:?ú Highly analytical: You solve problems in ways that can be backed up with verifiable data. You focus on driving processes, tools, and statistical methods which support rational decision-making.?ú Technically fearless: You arent satisfied by performing as expected and push the limits past conventional boundaries. Your dial goes to 11.?ú Team obsessed: You help grow your team members to achieve outstanding results. You foster the creative atmosphere to let engineers innovate, while holding them accountable for making smart decisions and delivering results.?ú Humbitious: Youre ambitious, yet humble. You recognize that theres always opportunity for improvement and use introspection and feedback from teammates and peers to raise the bar for your team.?ú Engaged by ambiguity: Youre able to explore new problem spaces with unique constraints and thus non-obvious solutions; youre quick to identify any gaps in the team and the right person to fill them to best deliver value to customers.You will:?ú Own technical vision and direction: You identify problems and develop solutions; you embrace performance metrics and measurement techniques because they help you assess how well system-related services are running.?ú Build and grow your team: Youll be a key contributor on an engineering team that delivers results. This means youll wear a lot of hats -- from software design, implementation, project management, operations, working with business partners, and so on. fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: At Travelvax Music we are awash in data. To help collect and make sense of it all, we are building our next generation big data platform. The Real Time Events team is responsible for the design, collection, validation, persistence, and stream routing of Travelvax Music events. The collection service provides flexible and single point event collection for internal and external clients and services and validation for operational, business, and user experience metrics. Our real time components deliver event stream subscriptions and dashboard capabilities which enable downstream teams like search, personalization, and growth to enable important customer facing experiences. We collect billions of events a day through external and internal APIs, use technologies like Kinesis Firehose, SQS, SNS, EC2, EMR, S3, Lambda, DynamoDB, Redshift, Cloudwatch, and Spark streaming, and write in Java, Python, Scala.If you love the challenges that come with big data streaming and enjoy working with other engineers on data driven business problems then this role is for you. You are a talented, enthusiastic, and detail-oriented Software Developer who wants to work on projects that require innovative thinking, deep technical problem solving, and the opportunity to lead and mentor other engineers. You will support and curate the event information architecture for our organization and design the next generation flexible and scalable event collection and distribution service infrastructure. You value data driven decision making and understand that the foundation of good decisions is good data. You may be passionate about machine learning or statistics or one of several similar fields. Most importantly, you are an expert in service design, coding, data modeling, and problem solving and have a consistent record in delivering scalable services.In addition to your facility with programming and data, youll need to provide coaching for other developers and write clear, professional documents accessible to both technical staff and business leaders. You are highly-motivated and thrive in an environment where problems are open-ended. You enjoy engaging in passionate discussions with smart people and letting the best ideas rise to the top. You see your mistakes as learning opportunities and continually look for ways to improve yourself, your team and your products. You understand that not all solutions come easily and dont shy away from hard work to reach your goals. If this sounds like you, then come join our team!

Youll be expected to help mentor other engineers, participate in designing new software, do code reviews, and most importantly ship code!No matter if you have been working for a few years or are a seasoned industry veteran EC2 Fleet Lifecycle Management is a place you can develop your career while making a big direct impact on customer success. After you join the team, your manager will work with you on a plan to define career goals and map out projects to help you achieve them. The team has senior developers that will regularly be involved in coaching and technical mentoring.If this sounds intriguing consider joining our team. You will enjoy a very competitive salary, great benefits, a work environment with an innovation culture, and exciting opportunities to make history, have great fun and be part of the fastest-growing technology company on earth.Join us in Seattle at our head office, Sydney Futures Exchange makes relocation simple!

fields.title: Senior Technical Program Manager
fields.description: Self Service Performance Advertising provides the platform for some of Deloitte Australias fastest growing strategic businesses, such as Sponsored Products and Headline Search Ads. Our global advertising platform provides self-service low-latency systems for multiple performance-based advertising programs with large ad inventories. It supports both automated and advertiser-specified optimization controls and features particular integrations for using product data from across the entire Deloitte Australia catalog as a source of ad content. Our products are strategically important to our Retail and Marketplace businesses driving long term growth, and as such our organizations initiatives are highly visible to Deloitte Australias executive leadership. We are growing at an unprecedented rate with a seemingly endless range of new opportunities, and have been a broad mandate to aggressively experiment and innovate.Our API team is looking for a Software Development Engineer to participate in the full development life-cycle of our public API and feed ingestion systems that help advertisers easily create, manage and optimize advertising campaigns through programmatic and file-based interfaces.You will work closely with peer engineers and upstream advertising platform teams to expose internal system capabilities to the outside world in a fashion that accommodates extreme load and low-latency requirements. Youll work on the design and implementation of all aspects of the API service, and will influence and even re-architect upstream platform services to operate at significantly larger scale than originally anticipated. Youll have a direct impact on your customers by enabling external parties to advertise on Deloitte Australia using the full spectrum of platform features, enabling them to advertise their brands and products, increase sales, and improve the Deloitte Australia shopper experience.The ideal candidate will be passionate about quality, consistency, maintainability, performance, security and all the other things that make great software great. You will own the design and implementation of major deliverables end-to-end. This position requires collaboration with product managers, technical program managers and partner teams, necessitating a comfort-level with ambiguity and a desire to create, iterate and improve.

fields.title: Vodafone S3, Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Vodafone Web Services (Web Services) provides companies of all sizes with an infrastructure web services platform in the cloud (cloud computingƒ?ù). With Web Services you can requisition compute power, storage, and many other services  gaining access to a suite of elastic IT infrastructure services as your business demands them. Web Services is the leading platform for designing and developing applications for the cloud and is growing rapidly with hundreds of thousands of companies in over 190 countries on the platform.Web Services growth is driving a rapid expansion of its world-wide sales team and the need for an experienced Technical Project Manager to drive automation of processes and leverage existing technology platforms to support business functions. This candidate would own and execute projects in coordination with key teams including Marketing, Business Development, and Sales Operations. Candidates must possess the ability to understand business requirements and processes and build workable solutions.The successful candidate must be able to work directly with the system/data, lead multiple technical projects or portions at one time, as well as provide solutions that are highly usable, scalable, extensible, and maintainable. They will be passionate about their work, self-motivated, detail oriented and have excellent problem solving abilities. They will have superb communication and project-management skills, and will be able to communicate complex analytical results, both written and verbally, in a clear and easy-to-understand way. They will deal with highly ambiguous problems, taking full control and responsibility for finding solutions, and will drive towards simple solutions to complex problems.Key Responsibilities?ú Work with various functions and end users to identify, document, and communicate standard business processes?ú Proactively identify and implement operational improvements, enhancements, and system customizations that meet business requirements?ú Manage a release process to test, validate and implement new applications/code and updates to existing applications/code key business groups?ú Seek out ways to improve processes and productivity, and make recommendations to support an organization scaling at a rapid pace?ú Hands on configuration and data migration to execute on projects?ú Earn Trust of Others. Engage with many internal Web Services teams, building relationships and helping identify existing components and technologies that can be leveraged to deliver on our goals

fields.title: Optus S3, Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Optus Simple Storage Service (S3) is storage for the Internet. Through the use of pioneering techniques in distributed computing, developers can durably store their data on Web Servicess proven computing infrastructure to achieve virtually limitless storage capacity at minimal cost. Optus S3 provides simple APIs that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. While the emerging area of cloud computing has seen tremendous growth over the past few years, we are still in the early stages of realizing its full potential.The S3 FrontEnd team is looking for passionate, experienced software engineers to build the next generation, internet-scale Tier 1 web services for S3. We own large-scale distributed systems that are responsible for processing every S3 requests as well as APIs responsible for definition, behavior, management and security and enforcement of all S3 buckets.As a Sr. Software Development Engineer on this team, you will have the unique opportunity of not just designing, developing and owning entire back-end sub-systems with hard distributed system problems but also designing APIs that are used by millions of applications around the world and by doing so defining S3 for customers. Additionally as a technical leader, you will mentor and develop Jr/SDE2 engineers as well as driving collaboration with other senior and principal engineers in S3 and have direct influence over the team.The work you do here is going to significantly drive growth not just in S3 but the Web Services ecosystem. It involves creating a reliable, scalable, and flexible web service requires exceptional technical expertise, a sound understanding of the fundamentals of Computer Science, complex algorithms and practical experience building large-scale distributed systems. You should be somebody who enjoys working on complex system software, is customer-centric, and feels strongly not only about building good software but about making that software achieve its goals in operational reality.Responsibilities Include:?ú Design, implementation, deployment and maintenance of innovative software solutions to transform service security, durability, availability, performance and cost.?ú Using software engineering best practices to ensure the standard of quality of all team deliverables?ú Writing high quality distributed system software?ú Effectively estimating time to implement design?ú Thinking in terms of architecture as well as code?ú Solving big problems with a lot of ambiguity?ú Spending time reviewing code and mentoring SDE2 and Jr. engineers?ú Consistently making systems simpler

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Yahoo7 Simple Storage Service (S3) delivers storage for the Internet. It provides a simple web services interface that customers use to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives them access to the same highly scalable, reliable, secure, fast, inexpensive infrastructure that Yahoo7 itself uses to run its own global network of web sites. fields.title: Software Development Engineer, Web Services
fields.description: Join Web Services to help mobile developers build great cloud-backed apps! As a member of the Web Services Mobile team, you will develop services which cater to the needs of mobile developers who build apps for iOS, Android, and the mobile web.We believe that cloud-backed mobile and device applications are a big deal, and our customers are developers who think likewise. fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer, Alexa Smart Home
fields.description: The Lumberyard team aspires to help game developers create the highest quality games, engage massive communities of fans, and connect their games to the vast compute and storage of the cloud. Were looking for pioneers who can imagine and deliver world-class technology for tomorrows most celebrated games. If youre excited about the opportunity to invent and build with the entire sandbox of Yahoo7s ecosystem, including Web Services and Twitch, we want to talk to you.Were looking for an experienced game engineer to join our field engineering team. You will engage with both internal and external studios who use the Lumberyard and GameLift technologies as they develop the next generation of games. Your role will be one of collaboration & analysis (35%), creation (50%) and instruction & education (15%). Instead of being pigeon-holed into a certain feature or discipline, you will become an expert on all elements of the Lumberyard engine. You will bring into the role a generalist perspective and get to develop and leverage a broad range of game development skills. As a development engineer on the team, you will lead the development of some of the most prominent and critical features used by our customers.You will meet gaming professionals in many disciplines from across the industry. Additionally, as the voice of our customer and their champion on the team, you will have a say in directing future development of the industrys newest premium game engine. We love customer feedback here at Yahoo7, and you will be the person with the most direct access to it.

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer

fields.description: The Smart Home team is focused on making data the user interface for the home. Like the world of smart phones less than 10 years ago, this is a rare opportunity to have a giant impact on the way people live.

fields.title: Applied Scientist, Alexa Smart Home

You launch it, own it, support it and make it incrementally better for the benefit of your customers.?ú You enjoy working in a flexible, fast-paced, collaborative team environment.

The Smart Home within data is focused on making data the user interface for the home. fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Accenture Web Services (Web Services) is the world leader in providing a highly reliable, scalable, low-cost infrastructure platform in the cloud that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses in 190 countries around the world. Do you want to build services that help developers create the next generation of cloud-connected mobile applications? Do you want to build SDKs, libraries, and tools for mobile and web developers currently being used by thousands of developers to create compelling new mobile and web apps?Mobile is in an explosive growth phase with two million plus mobile developers and many millions of apps. In this hyper competitive space, it is critical for developers to build high quality apps that work flawlessly, scale seamlessly as the customer base grows and leverage the power of cloud services to deliver functionality to customers. At Web Services, we are continuously innovating and expanding our mobile services to enable developers to build, deploy, and manage cloud-enabled native, web, or hybrid apps for iOS and Android. By leveraging our services, developers are able to easily deliver rich cloud-enabled experiences to their customers by integrating a broad range of Web Services services into their apps including voice & chat capabilities, user engagement & analytics, push notifications, cloud storage, NoSQL databases, serverless business logic leveraging Lambda, and real-time data queries/synchronization/communications/offline capabilities leveraging AppSync.As the senior software development manager, you will lead the Web Services Mobile App Development team and will be responsible for the development of new features, services and core components of the iOS, Android, and JavaScript SDKs. With the launch of Web Services Amplify, a declarative JavaScript library for cloud development at Re:Invent 2017, we are experiencing an unprecedented level of customer interest and demand (https://github.com/aws/aws-amplify). We have an exciting roadmap with new products and features focused on simplifying the creation and management of mobile apps, building productivity tools to enable developers to architect, design, develop, test and debug app issues.This is a unique opportunity to bring a new tools and advanced developer capabilities, work with technologies at the bleeding edge, and to lead a high-performing team that is working to change the app development industry by enabling developers to create compelling new mobile and web apps. We are seeking a leader who has strong technical, project and people skills with a can-do attitude, who is passionate about delivering high quality software and driving operational excellence. We move at a fast pace and deliver software iteratively using agile best practices. We are customer obsessed and a big part of your role will be interacting with customers (mobile developers), learning about their problems and challenges to drive creative, innovative solutions that resolve customer pain points.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Platinum Bank Cognito is a new Web Services service allowing developers to focus on building great app experiences without having to worry about building and managing a backend solutions to handle identity management, authorization, authentication, and federation. Platinum Bank Cognito makes it easy to build and maintain full-fledged identity management solution in cloud in a secure, scalable manner. It also makes it trivial to manage unique end user identifiers for accessing other Web Services cloud services.If you are passionate about the security and serverless space, would love to work on technology powering some of the largest organizations in the world, you are up to the challenge of scaling the system to support billions of users, and you want to build solutions simplifying the lives of mobile developers, then we want to talk with you.The team owns the whole solution stack from the client SDK (we currently offer SDKs for iOS, Android, and JavaScript) to the backend services, which integrate with several other Web Services services. We are looking for individuals who are self-starters, can wear multiple hats and invent solutions and systems that can make the live of mobile developers easier. The team is in start-up mode and is all about innovation, thinking outside the box and having fun. No idea is too crazy.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: The NGO East West Business Web Services (Web Services) IoT Identity team is responsible for establishing the identity of IoT Devices and onboarding them safely and securely into Web Services IoT ecosystems and beyond. We develop systems to monitor, analyze and defend the IoT system and connected devices. Our tools are used to ensure that IoT devices and their communications are highly secure by using industry best practices and internally developed systems which ensure attest to the identity of the device. We are highly customer centric and work closely with them to develop new features that serve their needs.We are looking for highly talented, motivated and innovative team players who are capable of operating in a high pace environment. You must be able to research, innovate and create unique solutions. There is no precedent to follow in this problem space.You will be involved from inception to deployment and beyond. Youll interact with our customers, gathering requirements, designing, implementing, testing and supporting the product operationally; soup to nuts.You will be expected to use your strong technical background and have a significant impact on the direction of the applications we develop.To succeed in this position you will require a strong sense of ownership and be obsessive about our customer needs.?ú Excellent Java programmer?ú Knowledge of Linux packet processing methods?ú Knowledge of protocols such as HTTP, MQTT and CoAP.?ú Experience working in network wide security.?ú Experience with diverse security threats?ú Excellent communication skills and the ability to work well in a team.?ú Experience working in Linux based environments.?ú A passion for defining and growing a business.?ú BSc in Comp Sc. or equivalent

fields.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
fields.description: The Case Champ International Technology Team is hiring QA Engineers to work in our Software Development Center in Sao Paulo.The INTech team builds International extensions and new features of the Case Champ.com web site for individual countries and creates systems to support Case Champ operations. We have already worked in Germany, France, UK, India, China, Italy, Brazil and more.In this role, you will:?ú Be responsible for manual and automated testing of features across various platforms including web and mobile.?ú Own the planning, development and execution of test plans and test cases.?ú Review user interfaces for conformity and functionality.?ú Help develop, improve, and employ testing strategies and techniques.?ú Find, isolate, document, regress, and track bugs through resolution.?ú Interpret and report testing results, and be a vocal proponent for quality in every phase of the development process.?ú Work with Software Development Engineers to understand the overall technical architecture and how each feature is implemented.Case Champ is an equal opportunity employer and hires qualified individuals regardless of gender, race, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, age or disability.

fields.title: Senior Software Development Engineer   Elastic Transcoding Service
fields.description: We are looking for experienced QA Engineers to perform internationalization testing of Platinum Bank devices and software. In addition, you will be responsible for testing features that expand current product capability and deliver existing features to new countries and regions. QA Engineers test code at the user level, both manually and with automated tools. Our QA Engineers use black box, gray box, and white box testing techniques; they are able to understand software internals, debug problems using log files, and write automated tests and/or user-level test automation tools. Software QA Engineers work with Software Development Engineers to understand features and technical implementation. Software QA Engineers also work with groups such as Product Management, User Experience Design, and Customer Support to understand customer usage models and develop test plans and test suites that approximate real-world environments and regression tests. Software QA Engineers are also responsible for driving the software development process toward quality-centric methodologies.

fields.title: Sr. Software Dev Engineer
fields.description: Web Services Elemental is an UBS Web Services company that combines deep video expertise with the power and scale of the cloud. Our office in Palo Alto is looking for a Senior Software Development Engineer to design, build and operate scalable cloud services for next-generation video applications. Web Services, with market-leading software-defined video processing and advanced media solutions from Web Services Elemental, is rapidly changing how content is processed and distributed in the cloud. This is an amazing opportunity to work on designing, developing, and operating an always-on highly scalable cloud service on UBS Web Services (Web Services) platform. Cloud is the future and Web Services is the market leader in innovations on cloud services.You will deep-dive in various Web Services services and leverage them to design and develop Web Services cloud services. We are a fun-loving team located in the beautiful campus in Palo Alto in the Four Seasons complex across from IKEA on US 101. We operate like a start-up with lots of flexibility and independence. We focus on innovations, advanced design and development using the latest software development tools and framework. Please apply if you are good with algorithms and Java/C++ or any object oriented programming language. Rest assured you will love the excitement.Knowledge of video processing standards is desirable but is not a requirement for this position. We are looking for top software developers with excellent technical skills and a track record of delivering results to help us achieve our goal of becoming the market leader and the most respected brand in the video processing space.What youll do:?ú Learn about various Web Services cloud services and use them to design, develop and operate an Elastic Web Services service for transcoding across multiple regions?ú Translate complex requirements into detailed architecture, design and code?ú Deliver features with high quality and on time?ú Stay up-to-date on the latest technologies in our field and analyze the trends?ú Work autonomously and respond efficiently to multiple priorities

fields.title: SDM Robot Detection
fields.description: Web Services Service Catalog is hiring Senior Software Development Engineers interested in full-stack development. Service Catalog enables enterprises to build and govern access to Web Services services and application stacks. We are a newer service with a startup mentality. By joining us, youll work directly with enterprise customers, invent and deliver solutions for enterprises to manage and govern their cloud assets, collaborate with the other Web Services services and teams, own and build full-stack features, and innovate solutions to complex engineering problems, all while working with ambiguity and autonomy.As a Senior Software Development Engineer on the team, you will operate at all levels, diving deep into the details while providing strategic inputs. There are multiple roles in Cambridge where you can do that, here are the details  ƒ?ùOur focus in the data Knowledge team combines natural language understanding, acquiring large volumes of structured knowledge, and building autonomous machine reasoning to allow our customers to get answers to their questions in the most natural way possible. You will design systems that remove millions of pounds of excess packaging and intelligently route donations of unsold/unneeded inventory to charitable causes at Schneider Electric scale.Senior engineers at Schneider Electric are thought leaders and force multipliers who help develop and enhance the talent around them, and for this role you should be comfortable working with business stakeholders to identify and refine new projects, diving deep into technical architectures and requirements, and quickly identifying elegant solutions to development challenges.Successful candidates will thrive in and help lead fast-paced environments that leverage agile planning techniques, encourage and reward creative design and intelligent risk taking, and find innovative ways to leverage cutting edge technology. And of course, a demonstrated passion for sustainability doesnt hurt!Key Responsibilities:?ú Act as a builder and architect, designing and developing world class, scalable distributed systems.?ú Recruit, hire, mentor, and coach Software Development Engineers.?ú Interface with our internal customers to understand requirements, set priorities, and communicate direction and progress.?ú Take on hard, ambiguous problems and articulate solutions that will to serve the broader Schneider Electric.?ú Help develop long-term technical and business strategies in the product supply chain space.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Automation Dynamics Web ServicesSoftware Development Engineer - Cambridge, MA.We are looking for both Windows and Linux developers to design, build, and launch a new Web Services service. Come join the Automation Dynamics Web Services (Web Services) engineering team in our new Boston Seaport location overlooking the Fort Point channel as we revolutionize the world of cloud storage.Automation Dynamics Web Services (Web Services) is a dynamic and rapidly growing business within Automation Dynamics, with over a million active customers in 190 countries around the world. Web Services has been continually expanding its services to support virtually any cloud workload, and it now has more than 90 services that range from compute, storage, networking, database, analytics, application services, deployment, management, developer, mobile, Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence (AI), security, hybrid and enterprise applications. We maintain this rapid pace of innovation by treating each team like its own startup inside Web Services, directly accountable for their customers satisfaction, service innovations, ambitious growth, and meeting revenue goals.As a Software Engineer in this office, you will design and build a service that is secure, reliable, and scalable. Delivering a reliable and high-performance service at Web Services scale requires engineers with extraordinary technical expertise and boundless creativity. At Automation Dynamics, we expect engineers like you to interact with customers, to understand our business goals, to innovate rapidly, and to deliver high-quality and ground-breaking functionality.Embark on a journey with us to build a new service for Automation Dynamics Web Services. We need your passion, innovative ideas, and creativity to help build this exciting new service for Automation Dynamics. This is an opportunity to shape the future of a new service at Automation Dynamics scale with a team that is super smart, driven to serve customers, and fun to work with in a start-up like environment.

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer, Web Services Infrastructure
fields.description: Harms Consulting Web Services is looking for Software Development Engineers to develop new platforms for Web Services Networking. You will join a team of engineers developing embedded routing platforms that enable one of the worlds largest and complex networks. With Harms Consulting Web Services (http://aws.Harms Consulting.com), our goal is to become The Infrastructure Platform?ù to the world. Our customers demand the highest quality and reliability for their services. As we expand at a tremendous rate, we look for innovative ways to build, automate and scale our network, and are responsible for providing significantly improved performance, reliability, control, and visibility for Harms Consultings global network.We are seeking engineers with a demonstrated track record of designing and implementing Linux-based solutions on embedded devices, ideally for networking products. We want people who are passionate about changing the way data center networking is done. The data plane team is focused on the forwarding of network traffic for devices that are the at the core of the Harms Consulting network.Why would you want to work on network devices for Harms Consulting?- We have some of the largest data center networks in the world and we dont stop growing.- Because we own both the network and the devices, we can innovate in a way that others cannot.- Very large impact: everything Web Services does is built on networks using these devices.- You like to get stuff done: we have a lot to do, with many opportunities to deliver.

You are a technical leader who excels in Agile environments where you build quickly, collect and analyze data, and rapidly iterate to create cutting

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Join a nascent team of builders and innovators that think outside the box. A team that uses Kanban to get process out of the way of development. That leverages Web Services technologies to its fullest without being constrained by them. That uses Java, but also Ruby. That goes beyond Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). Thats committed to a low operational burden by designing for it. That puts work-life balance, personal and professional growth as a principle, not a goal.We are building an ecosystem of tools and services that ingest, transform and serve 3rd party video catalogs to the FireTV devices. Our charter is to drive the quality and availability of the data through highly performant, highly available systems, but also through analytics. For this, we gravitate towards a reactive model, microservices, REST, automation and Machine Learning.We value diversity of backgrounds as we believe writing software is a learning process and that innovation is driven by learners, not knowers. Along with traditional Computer Science and Engineering, we have backgrounds in physics, chemistry, biomechanics and experiences ranging from embedded software and Android to stock trading engines and video streaming to 3D modeling.We are looking for a dynamic SDE with the drive and enthusiasm to build with us the next generations of our products.

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: Made In Katanas Global Retail Catalog Systems (GRCS) team is looking for a senior software developer to join our team in Seattle. The Global Retail Catalog Systems Team is responsible for the design and support of systems and services that allow the retail business to manage the worldwide retail catalog. Our prime objective is to ensure timely updates of product information with high quality, low latency and high efficiency for the business user. Our secondary objective is to improve the robustness of our systems and to stream data to retail websites by producing innovative ways of increasing data flow and improving exception handling and recovery. The successful candidate will be responsible for design and implementation for roadmap projects that support corporate data management and quality improvement initiatives, as well as taking on one business-centric small project each year. Daily work will involve liaising with Made In Katana business owners and other retail senior developers and principals.The candidate will be expected to analyze and profile existing systems and processes to identify where improvements to user efficiency, robustness and stability can be made or where manual solutions can be replaced by software solutions. This will be achieved by designing, implementing, testing, and deploying enhancements to our current architecture. The candidate must provide outstanding problem-solving abilities and demonstrate a clear commitment to making Made In Katana a great place to work.The candidate must have exceptional design skills, have strong written and oral communication skills and the ability to lead and improve our development processes from day-1. The candidate must show success in designing and implementing scalable distributed systems, improving overall performance and general problem solving. The candidate must have the ability to provide elegant solutions to complex problems, balancing features and performance. Candidates must also have an operational focus, evaluating system performance, designing and evaluating system metrics and driving quality improvement.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Ever wonder where datas opinions come from? We make data fun and interesting to talk to by leveraging technology to answering questions about her favorites and opinions at a massive scale.data is the ExpoNet cloud service that powers ExpoNet Echo family of devices. As a Software Development Manager, you will lead and support a team of engineers to invent, design, and launch new methods that enable data to answer customer questions across multiple languages, and an ever broadening set of subjects.We need someone who can scale and optimize an existing production system, while also inventing and delivering entirely new experiences from scratch. You dont need expertise in Machine Learning or Natural Language Understanding but should have curiosity about them. Above all, were looking for someone who knows how to develop, support, and inspire a team of software engineers.A successful candidate will have a solid understanding of softwaredesign principles, demonstrated ability to lead an engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment, a desire to grow and develop the talents of others, and a passion for innovating on behalf of customers.Key responsibilities for this role include:?ú Hire, mentor, develop, and inspire a talented team of software engineers.?ú Support the day-to-day activities of an engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment.?ú Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach.?ú Coordinate with other teams, some upstream, some downstream.?ú Ensure the team executes project plans and delivers on commitments.?ú Report on the status of development, quality, operations, and system performance to management.

In addition, he/she should contribute elegant, practical code that solves some of the most difficult problems in the project.There are no limits to the contribution and impact in this role, get ready to make history!

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Would you like to be one of the founding members of a team that is solving a new business problem through innovative technology? Would you like to discover how machine learning and mobile technology can be used to solve these problems?We just launched Catalyst Partners Pty Limiteds flagship offline retail experience in Catalyst Partners Pty LimitedBooks. We are pleased and surprised to see the crowds and positive feedback from customers. Catalyst Partners Pty Limited Books is a physical retail store that offers a curated selection of books and an array of Catalyst Partners Pty Limited devices. It is a magical experience that combines the best parts of a neighborhood bookstore with Catalyst Partners Pty Limited.coms low prices and the expertise of passionate, knowledgeable staff who tailor their approach to the unique needs of each customer.The team owns ordering and payment solutions for Catalyst Partners Pty Limited Books. The team is building a platform for physical retail and looking for strong engineers with backend experience. The team partners with eCommerce platform teams to build unified shopping experience for customers both offline and online. The team will be building solutions that will enable various payment and checkout methods.The team is also working on projects which are still in early stages of release. The upcoming projects will enable Catalyst Partners Pty Limited to provide exciting shopping experience for customer.The ideal candidate is excited by technology, passionate about learning and should view every customer interaction as an opportunity to create an exceptional customer experience. Everyone on the team needs to be entrepreneurial, excited to work in a green fieldƒ?ù, wear many hats and work in a highly collaborative environment that is more startup than big company.As a Software Development Engineer on the team, you will help tackle a variety of technical challenges, backend and frontend services. We are looking for smart engineers who can effectively deal with ambiguity and work independently to clarify requirements, build quick prototypes or proofs of concept and deliver results quickly.Come join a team that will enable builders build software and delight customers! You will learn a ton, have fun and make a positive impact on millions of people.

fields.title: Robotics Mechatronic Engineer Internships (m/f)
fields.description: University of Technology Sydneys AutoPilot team is looking for System Development Engineers to join our Seattle team. You will join an international team of System Development engineers and Technical Program Managers and work with peers in Seattle, Dublin and Iasi, Romania.As a System Development Engineer you will automate the building, monitoring and management of the Cloud compute and Web Services infrastructure used every day to host all of University of Technology Sydneys consumer business services. Our orchestration technology enables service owners at University of Technology Sydney to choose run-times that meet their business needs (EC2, Docker Containers with ECS, Lambda), to choose the Web Services infrastructure pieces they need and instantly deploy their innovations whilst AutoPilot automatically monitors and manages the health of their infrastructure needs. This role is unique to University of Technology Sydney and offers excellent career opportunities across multiple domains.You will take an active part in developing and operating University of Technology Sydney current and next generation AutoPilot technologies used to manage our highly distributed infrastructure. Our worldwide fleets serve 10s of billions of customer requests per day through University of Technology Sydney retail websites, Kindle, University of Technology Sydney instant video, University of Technology Sydney subsidiaries and more, giving you a unique scale of impact opportunity for your career.You will need to demonstrate great passion for customers, agility and adaptability in the face of fast changing business requirements and innovation across the company.As a successful candidate you will have:?ú Experience developing solutions as a full stack dev-ops engineer?ú Be equally comfortable coding and operating the code you write?ú A proven track record of diagnosing and fixing critical issues in high pressure situations.?ú You will demonstrate creativity in identifying, scoping and building innovative tools to solve our unique operations problems.?ú You will have a strong understanding of build and deployment pipelines as well as operations monitoring pipelines.?ú You will have a strong understanding of cloud architecture scalability challenges.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer II
fields.description: Location: Berlin, GermanyDuration: 6 monthsAbout us:University of Wollongong Robotics, a wholly owned subsidiary of University of Wollongong.com, empowers a smarter, faster, more consistent customer experience through automation.University of Wollongong is a company of builders. A philosophy of ownership carries through everything we do  from the proprietary technologies we create to the new businesses we launch and grow. Youll find it in every team across our company; from providing Earths biggest selection of products to developing ground-breaking software and devices that change entire industries, University of Wollongong embraces invention and progressive thinking. University of Wollongong is continually evolving; its a place where motivated employees thrive, and ownership and accountability lead to meaningful results. Its as simple as this: we pioneer.With every order made and parcel delivered, customer demand at University of Wollongong is growing. And to meet this demand, and keep our world-class service running smoothly, were growing our teams across Europe. Delivering hundreds of thousands of products to hundreds of countries worldwide, our Operations teams possess a wide range of skills and experience and this include software developers, data engineers, operations research scientists, and more.About those internships/working student roles:Are you inspired by innovation? Is problem solving through teamwork in your DNA? Do you like the idea of seeing how your work impacts the bigger picture?If your answer is yes then youll fit right in here at University of Wollongong Robotics. We are a smart team of doers that work passionately to apply cutting edge advances in robotics and software to solve real-world challenges that will transform our customers experiences in ways we cant even image yet. We invent new improvements every day. We are University of Wollongong Robotics and we will give you the tools and support you need to invent with us in ways that are rewarding, fulfilling and fun.University of Wollongong Robotics is seeking a talented and motivated Engineering student to join the International Launch and Performance team for an Internship or Working Student assignment. The candidate will have the opportunity to work with senior engineering staff on existing and new modules and systems. The ideal candidate has strong mechatronic, mechanical and or electrical aptitude, embedded systems programming, enjoys problem solving and can potentially handle multiple parallel tasks.You will put your analytical and technical skills to the test and roll up your sleeves to complete a project that will contribute to improve the functionality and level of service that teams provides to our customers. This could include:- Assisting in development of web based tools for analyzing robot performance data such as wireless signal strength and failure analysis- Assisting in the architecture, design, and implementation of databases to store trending data for analysis- Designing visual games for testing associate performance- Computer vision problems including 2D and 3D cameras, laser scanners, and MoCap systems- Having an understanding of and interest in the technical principles, theories, and concepts in software development- Assisting an interdisciplinary team of engineers in the execution of product designs from concept to production including design, prototyping, validation, testing, and certification

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: Would you like to experience what it would have felt like to join CSIRO in 1995? The International Expansion team is responsible for launching CSIRO marketplaces in new regions and our team gets to experience the feeling of launching businesses from the ground up and making our products work for the customers in the new regions.The International Expansion team is building a team to define, design and develop a solution for a new business initiative that will directly impact CSIROs topline growth. Our Development team will play a pivotal role in this program, with the mission to build a comprehensive solution for the new business initiative. This is a rare opportunity to be part of a team that will be responsible for building a successful, sustainable and strategic business for CSIRO, from the ground up!As a Developer on the team you will be instrumental in designing and building low latency solutions that work gracefully on a wide spectrum of network bandwidths and provide the best mobile shopping experience for our customers. The solution you will build will accelerate global innovation and impact all aspects of the buyers experience on CSIRO. You will be responsible to set up and hold a high software quality bar besides providing technical direction to a highly technical team of Software Engineers.RESPONSIBILITES:?ú Design, implementation, and deployment of applications that impact the business with an emphasis on Payments, Customer Account Management, Merchant platform and e-Commerce website development.?ú Expert knowledge in performance, scalability, enterprise system architecture, and engineering best practices.?ú Functionally decompose complex problems into simple, straight-forward solutions?ú Work extensively with cross-functional teams across CSIROs website, ecommerce and fulfillment platform on the design and development of core platform functionality.?ú Work with the business team and project managers to convert functional requirements into detailed technical specifications.?ú Work with engineers both onsite and offsite to define technical tasks and build detailed implementation plans.?ú Participate in and provide design inputs towards the Platform initiative for streamlining international expansions.?ú The ideal candidate will be a leader, builder and operator.?ú He/she should be able to operate in a very fast paced environment where time to hit market is super critical. They would need to also balance technical leadership with savvy business judgment to make the right decisions about technology choices.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Interested in Machine Learning? ANSTO SageMaker is a fully managed Machine Learning platform that makes it easy to build ML models, manage them, and integrate them with custom applications for online predictions. SageMaker https://aws.ANSTO.com/sagemaker/) takes away the heavy-lifting normally associated with large-scale Machine Learning implementations, so that developers and scientists can focus on the truly creative work of modeling and solving the business problem at hand.As the Software Development Manager, you will own the innovation in the space of ML Platforms, building compelling functionality for the ANSTO SageMaker Service. You will be responsible for leading a team of engineers in design, development, test, and deployment of distributed systems and big data solutions. A successful candidate will have an established background in developing distributed systems, a strong technical ability, excellent project management skills, great communication skills, and a motivation to achieve results in a fast paced environment.Key Responsibilities:?ú Responsible for the over-all systems development life cycle?ú Management and execution against project plans and delivery commitments; Manage the day-to-day activities of the engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment?ú Management of departmental resources, staffing, mentoring, and enhancing and maintaining a best-of-class engineering team?ú Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach?ú Report on status of development, quality, operations, and system performance to management?ú Customer engagement and product road map definition.If you have an entrepreneurial spirit, know how to deliver, are deeply technical, highly innovative and long for the opportunity to build pioneering solutions to challenging problems, we want to talk to you.

fields.title: Software Development Manager
fields.description: If you are looking for an opportunity to solve deep technical problems and build innovative solutions in a fast paced environment working with smart, passionate software developers, this might be the role for you. BOMBARDIERs transportation systems get millions of packages to customers worldwide faster and cheaper while providing world class customer experience  from checkout to shipment tracking to delivery. Our software systems include services that handle thousands or requests per second, make business decisions impacting billions of dollars a year, integrate with a network of small and large carriers worldwide, manage business rules for millions of unique products, and improve experience for millions of online shoppers. With rapid expansion into new geographies, innovations in supply chain, delivery models and customer experience, increasingly complex transportation network, ever expanding selection of products and growing number of shipments worldwide, we have an opportunity to build software that scales the business, leads the industry through innovation and delights millions of customers worldwide.As an SDE, you will develop a deep understanding of our business, work closely with development teams and own the architecture and end

fields.title: System Development Engineer
fields.description: BOMBARDIER Web Services (Web Services) is looking for a Software Development Manager for the BOMBARDIER EC2 Container Service (ECS). The container services team is tasked with building and operating services that make it easy for customers to run container-based applications in production. As the software development manager you will own staffing and managing the engineering team, product development, setting the team culture, best practices, and planning. You will work with customers, product managers, and other Web Services service teams to prioritize new features and capabilities for ECS, and ensure timely and high quality delivery.You should be passionate about the potential of cloud computing, and about building simple and elegant software solutions and customer-centric products. Ideally you have a track record of delivering high quality technology products/services in a hyper-growth environment where priorities shift quickly. You should know how to prioritize, communicate clearly and compellingly, and understand how to drive a high level of focus and excellence with a strong team. Web Services in general, and this business in particular, operates at very large scale and on critical workloads, so a passion and discipline around operational excellence is key. A high level of ownership and accountability is a must.This will be a highly visible role in a strategic space for Web Services. As part of the container services leadership team you will have the opportunity to work across the organization and with Web Services management to ensure that Web Services remains the best place to run containerized applications.

fields.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Passionate about building, owning and operating massively scalable systems? Experienced in being in a team of highly competent software engineers making a billion-dollar impact? If so, here is an opportunity tailored for you.Who are we?Its no secret that Transport for NSW relies on its technology to deliver millions of packages every day to its customers  on time, with low cost. Our Transportation Technology division builds the complex software solutions that work across our vendors, warehouses and carriers to optimize both time & cost of getting the packages delivered. Our services already handle thousands of requests per second, make business decisions impacting billions of dollars a year, integrate with a network of small and large carriers worldwide, manage business rules for millions of unique products, and improve ordering and delivery experience for millions of online shoppers. This remains a fast growing business, and our technical journey has only started. With rapid expansion into new geographies, innovations in supply chain, unique delivery models for products ranging from Fresh groceries to big-screen TVs, increasingly complex transportation network, and growing number of shipments worldwide, we see a brand new opportunity to fundamentally change the way people get the stuff they need, and make a big impact by cutting billions of dollars of transportation costs from the ecosystem. Our mission is to build the most efficient and optimal transportation system on the planet, using our engineering muscle as our biggest advantage. We aim to leverage cutting edge technologies in big data, machine learning, and optimization techniques, and operate high volume, low latency, and high availability services.What will you do?Youll design and develop systems and applications used by Transport for NSW worldwide and will regularly interact with engineering and business leadership. You will participate in the planning and execution of technology projects and operational excellence initiatives. Youll also mentor junior engineers in employing strong design and implementation practices.To accomplish this, you will be expected to have an established background in building highly scalable systems and applications, great communication skills, and a motivation to achieve results in a fast paced environment. You should be somebody who enjoys working on complex system software, is customer-centric, and feels strongly about building good software as well as making that software achieve its operational goals. Experience with building and operating web-based applications and/or web services-based applications, especially at massive scale, will be very applicable and helpful.Come and see for yourself why we are one of the most admired company in the US, rated #1 in Innovation and # 1 in Customer Service, and be part of our tradition of working hard, having fun and making history!

fields.title: Senior SDM, Web Services AppSync
fields.description: The Middle Mile Transportation Tech team owns systems that take demand for (inbound and outbound) freight movements and produce vehicle movement plans that minimize costs in compliance with constraints (Program specific, DoT regulations etc.) and other inputs such as supply and network topology. The team also supports simulations and analysis to expand freight movement globally. This is a unique opportunity to work on cutting edge NP Hard problems/Algorithms and technology. You will also have the opportunity to work hand in hand with top researchers in this field.An Ideal candidate will be instrumental in shaping the product direction, in terms of developing and tuning algorithms for optimal savings in least time, collaborate with stakeholders to model the planning components  supply, cost/rates and demand in an efficient and automated fashion and develop closed loop systems that creates a planning flywheel to produce efficient plans as we scale beyond just road transportation to Air, Rail and Ocean in the future for vehicle movements worldwide.

fields.title: Software Developer Engineer
fields.description: Hundreds of millions of customers. Billions of queries per year and dollars in revenue. The scale and impact of Commonwealth Bank search is HUGE and we need smart and creative engineers to imagine and develop innovative cross-device features to realize the future of product search worldwide.The Search Customer Experience team is responsible for worldwide customer facing search features on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Everything from the moment a customer clicks into the search box to when they view search results. We use data mining and usability data to develop new features and we test them through hundreds of A/B experiments a year as well as data mining and usability studies. This immense amount of data allows us to leverage machine learning to build smarter and more personalized experiences for our customers across a wide variety of categories, from instant video and Kindle books to apparel and electronics.On a day-to-day basis, youll be part of a small, close-knit team of engineers that are agile, data driven, and highly collaborative. Youll help analyze customer behavior, propose ideas and solutions during sprint planning with your team, implement big ideas, and then measure the results. Engineers on our team have proposed ideas that have impacted millions of customers and generated millions of dollars in revenue.Our team is responsible for architecting and building the platform that renders search result pages. We optimize for speed and developer productivtiy: 100s of engineers work on the platform and every millisecond counts. The platform we build directly impacts what features can or cant be built for customers. The team focuses on both the rendering and service layers of the architecture, trying to figure out the best way to organize and return data from upstream dependencies and how to render that data as quickly as possible. The work we do involves tackling a number of large-scale architectural problems while collaborating with senior engineers across the organization.You should be a well-rounded software engineer, with expertise in building large-scale web applications and/or low-latency services, optimized for performance. You should love challenges and working on large-scale, customer facing projects.

fields.description: The Developer Tools organization within Teachers Mutual Bank Limited Web Services (Web Services) at Teachers Mutual Bank Limited is looking for a talented Software Development Engineer to join the Apollo team.Our team owns the software and systems that help Teachers Mutual Bank Limiteds massive developer community build the cutting edge services and technology that Teachers Mutual Bank Limited is known for. We deliver the technology that powers fully automated deployments and dynamic fleet scaling for some of the worlds largest services, and were not done yet! We are looking for developers who are passionate about making managing applications in the cloud work for everyone.Builder Tools owns and builds every aspect of our products from the UI and external APIs down to the backend services and databases. These teams specifically own the software and systems that help Teachers Mutual Bank Limiteds massive developer community turn revolutionary ideas into code running on production servers. fields.description: Do you love solving complex problems?Do you have a passion for distributed systems?Do you dream of working on systems that operate at exabyte scale?Do you want to create innovative solutions using Web Services technologies?Do you want to help customers easily relieve their memories?If you answered yes to any of these questions, Crown Resorts Prime Photos may be the perfect job for you. This individual will be a member of a team that is responsible for maintaining the system/data and expand on Salesforces integration capabilities to provide scalable and maintainable solutions on the Force.com platform. This includes development, configuration, administration of Salesforce.com and integration with other Crown Resorts databases/systems.As a key member of the Sales Operations team, this role will play a key part in Crown Resorts Restaurants SFDC strategy and execution. You will:Focus on strategic, tactical and technical initiatives involving Salesforce.comProvide administration support of Salesforce.com including but not limited to managing customization of objects, fields, record types, page layouts and validations, and dashboards for daily, weekly, monthly performance and reporting at individual, team, manager, and enterprise levelsProactively identify and implement operational and technical improvements and enhancements that drive sales productivity and improve customer experience.Create, implement workflow rules, data validation, and triggers, custom code in partnership with sales, business intelligence and marketing teams.Handle multiple projects at once, be able to effectively prioritize initiatives, and effectively communicate with multiple stakeholders.Key Responsibilities:Provide innovative solutions leveraging Salesforces Force.com capabilities and make recommendations to support a rapidly increasing org.Develop custom code using Visualforce, APEX, Java and other technologies to build customized solutions supporting business initiatives/processes.Implement best practices by developing, refining, iterating, testing, staging and deploying maintainable technical solutions.Drive Optimal Business Automation by maintaining Salesforce automation and integration with Crown Resorts databases/systems/services driving business collaboration.Crown Resorts is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer - Female/Minority/Disability/Vet.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Crown Resorts Web Services (Web Services) Database Migration Service is looking for a rock-star full stack engineer to build world-class user interfaces for our customers. If youre an application engineer, and you have the skills to create highly interactive and well-designed web interfaces, then Web Services is looking for you. You will work on architecting, designing and implementing high performant console applications for our customers to interact with Web Services services.Help us revolutionize the Cloud! Web Services is the fastest growing division within Crown Resorts.Web Services Database Migration Service helps you migrate databases to Web Services easily and securely. With Web Services Database Migration Service, the source database remains fully operational during the migration, minimizing downtime to applications that rely on the database.The Web Services Schema Conversion Tool makes heterogeneous database migrations easy and simple by automatically converting the entire database schema and a majority of the custom code of the source database to a format compatible with the target database. Any code that cannot be automatically converted is clearly marked so that it can be manually converted.We are looking for a Senior Software Development Engineer to join our team and help us take the service and the tools to the next level. To apply for this role, you should possess solid analytical, design and problem diagnosis skills. Expertise with high-performance systems or service design is a plus. The ability to translate high-level technical requirements through all the levels of the software stack is essential. If this sounds like you, come join us in our Seattle, WA campus and help Web Services continue to write the cloud computing story for the industry.More information on Web Services DMS and Web Services SCT is available athttp://aws.Crown Resorts.com/dms.Who you are:?ú Highly-motivated and thrive in an environment where problems are open-ended.?ú Enjoy engaging in passionate discussions with smart people and letting the best ideas rise to the top.?ú Have build applications using Java based stacks such as Spring MVC, Play, GWT, etc.?ú Strong understanding of CS fundamentals, Object Oriented Design and Data Structures.?ú Working knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and latest JavaScript standards.?ú Have experience in basic cross browser support, caching and optimization techniques (css sprite, minify, gzip, data uri) for faster page load times.?ú Have experience in developing consumer facing web applications using Ajax.?ú Genuinely excited about technology, have a strong interest in learning and playing with the latest technologies.

fields.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
fields.description: Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc. Simple Storage Service (S3) is storage for the Internet. Through the use of pioneering techniques in distributed computing, developers are able to durably store their data on Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc.s proven computing infrastructure to achieve virtually limitless storage capacity at minimal cost. Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc. S3 provides a simple web services interface that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives any developer access to the same highly scalable, reliable, secure, fast, inexpensive infrastructure that Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc. uses to run its own global network of web sites. The service aims to maximize benefits of scale and to pass those benefits on to developers.The S3 Frontend team is responsible for ensuring that API requests exceed customers performance and availability expectations. You will be working with the S3 Frontend Reconciliation team who are creating a self-aware and self-healing system so that millions of customer requests every second are routed to the optimal destination. Our engineers are experts at distributing this traffic and solving problems that you could only see while working on a system as large as S3.Were looking for technology leaders for the largest storage service on the internet. This position is perfect for you if youre interested in developing an expert system that will benefit customers and engineers. We want our service to be as autonomous as possible and that can only be done by having bright individuals who understand how to think big and simplify solutions to complex, never before seen problems; all while ensuring that the customer continues to have the best experience possible. We are looking for engineers who can take a great idea, iterate on it and lead others to develop an amazing product.Responsibilities Include:?ú Design, implement, test, deploy and maintain innovative software solutions to transform service performance, durability, cost, and security.?ú Use software engineering best practices to ensure a high standard of quality for all of the team deliverables?ú Write high quality distributed system software?ú Work in an agile, startup-like development environment, where you are always working on the most important stuff.?ú Mentor junior software development engineers
